Question: klstrngh kay aml ki wzuahat karain aur klstrngh alghwrthm ki msaal dyn۔
Answer: nyt wrk kay bhaaؤ kay msilay main zayada sy zayada bhaaؤ tlash karnay kay l you ، aap fwrda flkrsn alghwrthm ya is ki ayk mkhtlf haaltwn ، jesay aydamndas-karp alghwrthm ya daaink kay alghwrthm ka astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan taip askrpt main aydamndas karp alghwrthm ka ayk msaal aml haay: taip askrpt kwpy kwdaklas ghraf {njy ghraf: nmbr [] [] ؛knstrktr (ghraf: nmbr [] []) {this.graph = ghraf ؛bified njy by ayf ays (makhza: nmbr ، hadf: nmbr ، waldyn: nmbr []): bwlyn {knstt mlahazaha karain = niy srny (as. ghraf.lnth). fl (ghlta) ؛kanst ktaar: nmbr [] = [] ؛ktaar.psh (makhza) ؛dwrha [makhza] = sch ؛waldyn [makhza] = -1 ؛jbkha (ktaar۔ lmbaiy> 0) {kwnst yw = ktaar۔ shft () !؛kay liye (aaiyay v = 0 ؛ v <this.graph.length ؛ v ++) {aghr (! mlahazaha kya [v] && this.graph [u] [v]> 0) {ktaar.psh (v) ؛dwrha [v] = sch ؛waldyn [v] = u ؛}}} wapsy ka dwrha [hadf] ؛} njy mnkasyty (rastha: nmbr [] ، waldyn: nmbr []): nmbr {aaiyay mnt kypasyty = anfynty ؛aaiyay v = rastha [rastha۔ lmbaiy - 1] ؛jbkha (v! == 0) {const u = waldyn [v] ؛mincapacity = math.min (mincapacity ، this.graph [u] [v]) ؛v = u ؛min mincapacity waps ؛} njy apdaytrsydaywl ghraf (rastha: nmbr [] ، waldyn: nmbr [] ، mnkasyty: nmbr): batal {chlw v = rastha [rastha۔ lmbaiy - 1] ؛jbkha (v! == 0) {const u = waldyn [v] ؛this.graph [u] [v] -= mincapacity ؛this.graph [v] [u] += mincapacity ؛v = u ؛}} pblk myks flw (makhza: nmbr ، hadf: nmbr): nmbr {mstkl waldyn: nmbr [] = nya srny (as.ghraf.lnth) ؛aaiyay zayada sy zayada = 0 ؛jbkha (this.bfs (makhza ، hadf ، waldyn)) {const mincapacity = this.mincapacity ([hadf] ، waldyn) ؛this.updateresidual ghraf ([hadf] ، waldyn ، mincapacity) ؛myks flw += mincapacity ؛} myks flw ki wapsy ؛}} // msaal kay tawr par astamal: kanst ghraf = [[0 ، 16 ، 13 ، 0 ، 0 ، 0] ، [0 ، 0 ، 10 ، 12 ، 0 ، 0] ، [0 ، 4 ، 0 ، 0 ، 14 ، 14 ،0] ، [0 ، 0 ، 9 ، 0 ، 0 ، 20] ، [0 ، 0 ، 0 ، 7 ، 0 ، 4] ، [0 ، 0 ، 0 ، 0 ، 0 ، 0 ، 0] ،] ؛ kans nyt wrk =nya ghraf (ghraf) Const kanstr makhza = 0 Const knt targht = 5 ؛ kanst myks flw = nyt wrk۔ myks flw (makhza ، hadf) ؛ knswl.lwgh ("zayadha sy zayada bhaaؤ:" ، zayada sy zayada flw) ؛ is msaal main ، ghraf klas is ki nmaindghy krta haaynyt wrk flw ghraf۔ghraf praprty ayk do jhaty saf hay jo nwdas kay darmiyan knarwn ki salahaytwn ko mhafwza krty haay۔ by ayf ays ka tarykha kar sy la kar hadf tak brahanay wala rastha tlash karnay kay liye chwraaiy ki pehli tlash krta haay۔aghr is tarah ka rastha mwjwd hay aur mkhtsar trien rastay kay sath waldyn ki safwn ko ap dayt krta hay tou yeh sch waps aata haay۔ mnkasyty ka tarykha kar brahanay waly rastay kay sath kam sy kam salahayt ka tayn krta haay۔ apdaytyrsydaywl ghraf tarykha rastay ko brahanay kay bad bkaya ghraf ki salahaytwn ko ap dayt krta haay۔

Question: jnrytw aur amtyazay madalza main kya frk haay؟
Answer: ykyna!taip askrpt main mstkl astyk dayta dahanchay ka ayk msaal aml haay: taip askrpt kwpy kwdaklas astyk nwda <T> {kdr: t ؛aghla: astyk nwda <t> |khaly؛knstrktr (wylyw: ty ، aghla: astyk nwda <T> | null) {this.value = value ؛this.next = aghla ؛class} klas mstkl astyk <t> {njy wrzen: {[klyd: nmbr]: astyk nwda <T> |khaly }؛njy tazaha trien tbdyly: nmbr ؛knstrktr () {this.versions = {} ؛this.latestversion = 0 ؛yha۔} psh (wylyw: ty): batal {kwnt krntwrshn = this.latestversion ؛Const mwjwdha hayda = yha۔kwnst nyw hayda = nya astyk nwda (wylyw ، krnt hayda) ؛this.latestversion ++ ؛yha۔} pap (): batal {kwnt krnt wrsn = this.latestversion ؛Const mwjwdha hayda = yha۔aghr (mwjwdha hayda === null) {wapsy ؛} this.latestversion ++ ؛yha۔} tap (): ty |null {const hethead = this.versions [this.latestversion] ؛mwjwdha hayda waps! == kaladm؟mwjwdha hayda. wylyw: null ؛} getVersion (wrzen: nmbr): t [] {CONST ntyjha: t [] = [] ؛mwjwdha hayda = yha۔jbkha (krnt hayda! == null) {ntyjha۔ psh (mwjwdha hayda.Value) ؛mwjwdha hayda = krnt hayda. nykst ؛} wapsy ka ntyjha ؛}} // msaal kay tawr par astamal: kanst astyk = nya mstkl astyk <nmbr> () ؛ astyk.psh (1) ؛ astyk.psh (2) ؛ astyk.psh (3) ؛ kwnst wrzen 1 = astyk۔ lytstwrshn ؛ knswl.lagh (knswl.lagh (stac.getVersion (wrzen 1)) ؛// aaؤt pt: [1 ، 2 ، 3] astyk.pp () ؛ knst wrzen 2 = astyk۔ lytstwrshn ؛ knswl.lwgh (astyk.yt ghytwrsyshn (wrzen 2)) ؛// aaؤt pt: [1 ، 2] astyk.psh (4) ؛ knst wrzen 3 = astyk۔ lytstwrshn ؛ knswl.lwgh (astyk.yt ghyt anwrzen (wrzen 3)) ؛// aaؤt pt: [1 ، 2 ، 4] knswl.lwgh (astyk.jyt wyns (wrzen 1)) ؛// aaؤt pt: [1 ، 2 ، 3] knswl.lagh (astyk. tap ()) ؛// aaؤt pt: 4 un msaal kay tawr par ، astyk nwda klas astyk main nwda ki nmaindghy krty haay۔har nwda main astyk main aghlay nwda ka ayk kdr aur ayk hawalha hawta haay۔ mstkl astyk klas astyk dayta dahanchay ko mstkl tawr par nafza krta haay۔yha astyk kay mkhtlf wrzen ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye ayk lght (wrzen) astamal krta haay۔har wrzen ayk mnfrd wrzen nmbr kay sath wabstha haay۔ psh tarykha ayk nya nwda bna kar aur astyk kay tazaha trien wrzen ko ap dayt krkay astyk main ayk niy kdr ka azuafha krta haay۔ pap tarykha kar kay tazaha trien wrzen ko ap dayt krkay astyk sy tap ansar ko hata dyta haay۔astyk۔ upar ka tarykha tazaha trien wrzen main astyk kay awpry ansar ki kdr lwtata haay۔ ghyt wywrshn ka tarykha nwdas ko abwr krkay aur akdar ki ayk saf ko waps krkay astyk ka ayk mkhsawsa wrzen bazayaft krta haay۔ msaal kay tawr par astamal kay hasaay main ، hum tkhlyk karty hayn۔ayk mstkl astyk ، is par akdar ko dhkylyn ، aur ghyt wywrshn kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey astyk kay mkhtlf wrzen bazayaft kryn۔ham upar kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey astyk kay awpry ansar tak rsaiy haasal karnay ki salahayt ka bhi mzaaharha karty hayn۔

Question: mntkly sykhnay kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur yeh mshyn lrnngh main kis tarah astamal kya jaskta haay۔
Answer: do dawrwn kay mabyn mkhtsar trien mshtrkha baladsty tlash karnay kay l you ، aap mthark prwghramngh astamal krsktay hayn۔taip askrpt main ayk msaal kay nfaza yahan haay: taip askrpt kwpy kwdafkshn sharst kamns aprsyinsy (str1: strngh ، str2: strngh): strngh {const m = str1.length ؛const n = str2.length ؛// mshtrkha sprsywynss kans day py ki lmbaiy ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye ayk tybl bnaiyn: nmbr [] [] = [] ؛// tybl ko shrwa karain (aaiyay i = 0 ؛ i <= m ؛ i ++) {dp [i] = niy srny (n+1). fl (0) ؛} // (i = 1 ؛ i <= m ؛ i ++) {for (j = 1 ؛ j <= n ؛ j ++) {if (str1 [i - 1] === str2 [j- 1]) {dp [i] [j] = 1 + dp [i - 1] [j - 1] ؛} else {dp [i] [j] = math.max (dp [i - 1] [j] ، dp [i] [j - 1]) ؛table}}} // tybl ka astamal karty hoey mkhtsar trien aam sprsyiyns ki tamyr karain ، sprsyins = "" ؛i = m ؛j = n ؛jbkha (i> 0 && j> 0) {aghr (str1 [i - 1] === str2 [j - 1]) {supressequence = str1 [i - 1] + sprsywnsy ؛myn--؛J-- ؛} dusri sawrt main (dp [i - 1] [j]> dp [i] [j - 1]) {supresequence = str1 [i - 1] + sprsyiyns ؛myn--؛} else {supersequence = str2 [j - 1] + sprsyiyns ؛J-- ؛}} // str1 sy baky harwf shaml karain jabky (i> 0) {supersequence = str1 [i - 1] + sprsyins ؛myn--؛} // str2 sy baky harwf shaml karain jabky (j> 0) {supersequence = str2 [j - 1] + sprsyiyns ؛J-- ؛sup sprsyins ki wapsy ؛} // msaal kay tawr par astamal: kanst str1 = "aggtab" ؛ const str2 = "gxtxayb" ؛ const const const ould = shortscommonsupersequence (str1 ، str2) ؛ knswl.lwgh ("mkhtsar trien mshtrkha saabn:" ، ntyjha) ؛ is main ؛msaal kay tawr par ، sharst kamns aprysywyns fnkshn do dawr lyta hay ، STR1 aur STR2 ، kywnkha un pt aur mkhtsar trien aam sprsyins ko lwtata haay۔ fnkshn STR1 aur STR2 kay mshtrkha sprsywyns ki lmbaiy kay sath ayk tybl (DP) ko bhrnay kay liye mthark prwghramngh nktaha nzar ka astamal krta haay۔tybl ko nchlay hasaay main bhra hoa hay ، js main hr pwzayshn par STR1 aur STR2 kay krdarwn ka mwazanha kya jata haay۔ tybl ko bhrnay kay bad ، fnkshn tybl kay nechay dien kwnay sy byk tryk karty hoey mkhtsar trien mshtrkha baladsty ki tamyr krta haay۔yha STR1 aur STR2 kay krdarwn ka mwazanha krta hay aur fysalha krta hay keh aya krdar ko sprsyins main shaml kya jaye ya zayada sy zayada lmbaiy kay sath mlhakha syl main mntkl kya jaiay۔dw msaal kay tarwn (str1 aur str2) kay sath mkhtsar trien kamnsprsykwyns fnkshn۔as kay ntyjay main kam trien mshtrkha sprsyins knswl par chhpy hui haay۔

Question: tsawyry drjha bndy kay liye mjazay aasaaby nyt wrk (CNN) ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: lahakha drkht ko nafza karna ayk pychydha kam hay ، lekin main aap ko shrwa karnay kay liye ayk jaizaha aur kwda tymplyt fraham krskta hawn۔taip askrpt main ayk lahakha drkht ka bnyady nfaza yahan haay: taip askrpt kwpy kwdaklas lahakha lahakha lahakha {bchay: {[klyd: strngh]: lahakha astrynwda} ؛shrwa kryn: nmbr ؛akhttam: nmbr ؛knstrktr (shrwa: nmbr ، akhttam: nmbr) {this.children = {} ؛this.start = start ؛this.end = end ؛} aydaailda (klyd: strngh ، nwda: lahakha): batal {this.children [key] = nwda ؛} ghytaida (klyd: strngh): lahakha astrynwda |ghyr wzuahaty {as ko waps kryn۔ bchwn [klyd] ؛} haaschlda (klyd: strngh): bwlyn {as main rytrn klyd۔ bchwn ؛}} klas lahakha {jra: lahakha ؛mtn: tar ؛knstrktr (mtn: strngh) {this.text = mtn ؛this.root = nya lahakha astrynwda (-1 ، -1) ؛this.buildtree () ؛} blda try (): batal {const n = this.text.length ؛kay liye (aaiyay i = 0 ؛ i <n ؛ i ++) {mwjwdha = this.root ؛kay liye (j = i ؛ j <n ؛ j ++) {const key = this.text [j] ؛aghr (mwjwdha۔} else {const newnode = nya lahakha astrynwda (j ، n - 1) ؛mwjwdha.adaaidaaida (klyd ، nyw nwda) ؛mwjwdha = newnode ؛}}}} tlash (pytrn: strngh): bwlyn {aaiyay mwjwdha = this.root ؛kay liye (aaiyay i = 0 ؛ i <pytrn. lmbaiy ؛ i ++) {const key = pytrn [i] ؛aghr (mwjwdha۔} dusri {jhwty lwt ؛}} sch waps ؛}} // msaal kay tawr par astamal: kanst tykst = "kylay" ؛ kanst lazmi = nya lahakha (mtn) ؛ knswl.lwgh (lahakha۔ srch ("ayn aay")) ؛// aaؤt pt: trueconsole.log (lahakha. search ("ana")) ؛// aaؤt pt: trueconsole.log (lahakha۔ srch ("ana")) ؛// aaؤt pt: trueconsole.log (lahakha۔ srch ("aypl")) ؛// aaؤt pt: is msaal kay tawr par ، lahakha lahakha klas lahakha drkht main ayk nwda ki nmaindghy krta haay۔har nwda main sbstrngh kay aaghaza aur akhttamy pwzayshnwn aur is kay bchwn kay nwdas ka nkshha kay baray main malwmat hawty haay۔ lahakha klas lahakha drkht kay dayta dahanchay ko nafza krta haay۔as main ayk rwt nwda aur ayk tykst praprty hay jo asal mtn ki nmaindghy krty haay۔ blda try ka tarykha mtn main hr krdar par tkrar krkay aur drkht main shaml krkay lahakha drkht ki tamyr krta haay۔jb zurwry ho tou yeh niay nwdas tyar krta hay aur mwjwdha nwda ko ap dayt krta hay kywnkha yeh drkht ko abwr krta haay۔ tlash ka tarykha lahakha drkht main dyiay gaye nmwnha ki tlash krta haay۔yha jra sy shrwa hawta hay aur is rastay ki pyrwy krta hay jo pytrn kay krdarwn sy mlta haay۔ msaal kay tawr par astamal kay hasaay main ، hum "kylay" kay mtn sy ayk lahakha drkht bnatay hain aur kuch tlashyn karty hain takha yeh malwm kya jaskay keh drkht main kuch nmwnay mwjwd hain ya nhayn۔yha ayk lahakha drkht ka bnyady nfaza hay ، aur zayada aaly drjay ki afadyt jesay astrngh kay swalat ko snbhalna ، sab sy tawyl aam strngh tlash karna ، ya mymwry kay astamal ko bhatr bnana aap ki zurwryat kay mtaabk shaml kya jaskta haay۔

Question: drjha bndy kay kamwn kay liye fysalha kn drkhtwn kay astamal kay fwaid aur nksaanat kya hayn؟
Answer: kesi dyiay gaye tar main sab sy tawyl pylndarwmk mtzuad tlash karnay kay l you ، aap mthark prwghramngh astamal krsktay hayn۔taip askrpt main ayk msaal kay nfaza yahan haay: taip askrpt kwpy kwdafykyshn tawyl trien plaindarmkswbsyns (ays ty aar: strngh): strngh {const n = str.length ؛kanst day py: nmbr [] [] = [] ؛// tybl ko shrwa karain (aaiyay i = 0 ؛ i <n ؛ i ++) {dp [i] = nya srny (n). fl (0) ؛day py [i] [i] = 1 ؛// ayk hi krdar lmbaiy 1} // kay liye tybl ko nechay kay andaza main bhryn (lyn = 2 ؛ lyn <= n ؛ lyn ++) {kay liye (i = 0 ؛ i <n - lyn+)1 ؛ i ++) {const j = i+lyn - 1 ؛aghr (str [i] === str [j] && lyn === 2) {dp [i] [j] = 2 ؛} wrnha agar (str [i] === str [j]) {dp [i] [j] = dp [i + 1] [j - 1] + 2 ؛} else {dp [i] [j] = math.max (dp [i] [j - 1] ، dp [i + 1] [j]) ؛}}} // sab sy tawyl palindromic mtzuad ki tshkyl nw i = 0 ؛aaiyay j = n - 1 ؛chlw mtnazaaha = '' ؛jbkha (i <j) {if (str [i] === str [j]) {mtzuad += str [i] ؛i ++ ؛J-- ؛} wrnha agar (dp [i] [j-1]> dp [i + 1] [j]) {j-- ؛} else {i ++ ؛}} // agar tar ki lmbaiy ajyb hay tou ، drmyany krdar ko shaml karain agar (i === j) {mtzuad += str [i] ؛} kay bad ki wapsy ؛} // msaal kay tawr par astamal: kansttr = 'kryktr' ؛ kanst tawyl arsaay sy sab sy tawyl arsaay sy trtyb = tawyl trynpalaindarwwmkswbsyns (ays ty aar) ؛ knswl.lwgh ('sb sy tawyl pylaindarwwmk mshtrkha:' ، tawyl arsaay sy tay .n) ؛ is msaal main ، sab sy tawyl arsaay sy ، sab sy tawyl arsaay tak ، ayk taryk trien fnkshn ayk tar ki tar lyta hay ،chwnkha un pt aur lwtata haay۔tybl ko nechay ki taraf bhr diya jata hay ، mkhtlf lmbaiywn kay zayly zakhyrwn par ghwr karty hoey aur yeh janchtay hoey keh aya srwn kay harwf brabr hain ya nhayn۔ tybl ko bhrnay kay bad ، fnkshn tybl kay awpry dien kwnay sy byk tryk krkay sab sy tawyl pylndarwmk mtzuad ki tshkyl nw krta haay۔yha ays ty aar kay krdarwn ka mwazanha krta hay aur fysalha krta hay keh aya is krdar ko bad main shaml karna hay ya zayada sy zayada lmbaiy kay sath mlhakha syl main mntkl hona haay۔msaal kay tawr par strngh (ays ty aar) kay sath kam kryn۔as kay ntyjay main sab sy tawyl pylndarwmk mtzuad knswl par chhapta haay۔

Question: kmk sykhnay kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur kesi drkhwast ki msaal dyn۔
Answer: ykyna!taip askrpt main rynk aur raha kay kmpryshn kay zaryaha ywnyn kay sath das daysyt syt dayta dahanchay ka nfaza yahan haay: taip askrpt kwpy kwdaklas daswait syt {waldyn: nmbr [] ؛drjha: nmbr [] ؛knstrktr (saiza: nmbr) {this.Pearnt = nya srny (saiza) ؛this.rank = niy saf (saiza) ؛kay liye (aaiyay i = 0 ؛ i <saiza ؛ i ++) {this.peart [i] = i ؛this.rank [i] = 0 ؛}} tlash karain (x: nmbr): nmbr {if (this.palent [x]! == x) {// rastha kmpryshn: paiay janay waly jra ko x ka waldyn bnaiyn۔. waldyn [x]) ؛this is ko waps kryn۔ waldyn [x] ؛} ywnyn (x: nmbr ، Y: nmbr): batal {const rootx = this.find (x) ؛kanst rwt = this.find (y) ؛aghr (rwt ayks! == rwt) {// ywnyn bazaria drjha: lmbay drkht ko lmbay drkht ki jra sy jwrayn agar (this.rank [rwtks] <this.rank [rwt]) {this.pearnt [rwt ayks] =jra ؛} dusri sawrt main agar (this.rank [rwt ayks]> yha۔ rynk [rwt]) {this.peart [rwt] = rwt ayks ؛} else {this.pearnt [rwt] = rwt ayks ؛this.rank [rootx] ++ ؛}}} isconnected (x: nmbr ، Y: nmbr): bwlyn {as ko waps kryn۔}} // msaal kay tawr par astamal: kwnst day ays = nya dasywintsyt (5) ؛ day ays ywn (0 ، 1) ؛ day ays ywn (2 ، 3) ؛ day ays ywn (1 ، 4) ؛ knswl.lwgh (ds.isconced(0 ، 4)) ؛// aaؤt pt: trueconsole.log (ds.isconnected (2 ، 4)) ؛// aaؤt pt: is par aml draamd ko ghalat ، nakarha tabkay ki klas das daysyt syt dayta dahanchay ki nmaindghy krty haay۔as main do safyn hayn: hr ansar kay waldyn ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye waldyn aur hr ansar kay drkht ki drjha bndy (tkhmynha ghharaiy) ko zakhyrha karnay kay liay۔ yeh knstrktr waldyn ki saf ko is tarah shrwa krta hay keh hr ansar abtdaiy tawr par is ka apna waldyn hawta hay ، aur drjha bndy abtdaiy tawr par hawty haay۔tmam zayrw۔ tlash karnay ka tarykha is syt ki jra (nmaindha) tlash krta hay js main dyiay gaye ansar X ka talk haay۔fainda aapryshn kay doran ، paiay janay waly jra ko mstkbl ki tlash kay l X ka braha rast waldyn bnanay kay liye path kmpryshn ka atalak kya jata hay ، jo drkhtwn kay dahanchay ko chpta karnay main mdd krta haay۔ ywnyn ka tarykha kar X aur Y kay zaryaha nmaindghy karnay waly do sytwn ka athaad anjam dyta haay۔as ko pehlay tlash kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey sytwn ki jrayn mil jati hayn۔as kay bad ، yeh jrawn ki safwn ka mwazanha krta hay aur drkht ko chhwtay drjay kay sath braay rynk kay sath jra sy jwrata haay۔aghr safyn brabr hain tou ، ayk drkht dusray kay sath mnslk hawta hay ، aur niy jra kay ahaday main azuafha hawta haay۔ agar is sy mnslk tarykha chyk krta hay keh agar do anasar X aur y apnay jra anasar ka mwazanha krkay ayk hi syt main hayn۔ msaal kay tawr par astamal kay hasaay main astamal kay hasaay myn۔، hum panch anasar kay sath napsndydha syt tshkyl dy kar napsndydha tabkay kay astamal ka mzaaharha karty hayn۔ham kuch ywnyn ki karwaiyan anjam dytay hain aur is sy mnslk tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey anasar ki rabtaay ki janch karty hayn۔ntaij knswl par chhapay gaye hayn۔

Question: nghrany sykhnay main rjat aur drjha bndy main kya frk haay؟
Answer: 2D jghha main pwaints kay ayk syt main pwaints ki kryb trien jwray tlash karnay kay l you ، aap tksym aur ftha alghwrthm ko "pwaints ki kryb trien jwray" alghwrthm kay nam sy jana jata haay۔taip askrpt main ayk msaal kay nfaza yahan haay: taip askrpt kwpy kwda antrfys pwaint {x: nmbr ؛Y: nmbr ؛} fnkshn ka fasalha (P1: nktaha ، P2: nktaha): nmbr {const Dx = p2.x - p1.x ؛const dy = p2.y - p1.y ؛waps myth۔ ays kyw aar ty (dx * dx + dy * dy) ؛} fnkshn brtfwrs (pwaints: pwaint [] ، shrwa: nmbr ، akhttam: nmbr): nmbr {aaiyay zahanyt = lamhadwdyt ؛kay liye (i = start ؛ i <= end ؛ i ++) {for (j = i+1 ؛ j <= end ؛ j ++) {kwnst dast = dastns (pwaints [i] ، pwaints [j]) ؛midestance = math.min (zahan sazay ، zula) ؛}} lwtnay wali zahanyt ؛} fnkshn astrp klwsyst (pwaints: pwaint [] ، saiza: nmbr ، zahan: nmbr): nmbr {aaiyay mnt = zahan sazay ؛kay liye (i = 0 ؛ i <saiza ؛ ++ i) {for (j = i +1 ؛ j <saiza && pwaints [j] .y - pwaints [i] .y <mnt ؛ ++ j) {kwnst dast = fasalha (pwaints [i] ، pwaints [j]) ؛MIN = math.min (mnt ، zula) ؛}} rytrn mnt ؛} fnkshn klwzatyl (pwaints: pwaint [] ، shrwa: nmbr ، akhttam: nmbr): nmbr {kanst saiza = akhttam - shrwa + 1 ؛aghr (saiza <= 3) {waps brtfwrs (pwaints ، astart ، akhttam) ؛} const MID = math.floor ((start + end) / 2) ؛mdapwaint = pwaints [drmyany] ko brkrar rakhien ؛kanst lyft dastns = kryby (pwaints ، astart ، wsta) ؛kwnt raitstyns = kryby (pwaints ، wsta + 1 ، akhttam) ؛midestance = math.min (baiyn bazaw ، dien tarf) ؛kanstrp: pwaint [] = [] ؛aaiyay j = 0 ؛kay liye (i = start ؛ i <= end ؛ i ++) {if (math.abs (pwaints [i] .x - mdapwaint. x) <zahanyt) {pty [j] = pwaints [i] ؛J ++ ؛st} kwnstrp dastns = astrp klwsyst (pty ، jay ، zahan sazay) ؛rytrn myth myn (zahan sazay ، strp dastyns) ؛} fnkshn klwza astyt pyir (pwaints: pwaint []): nmbr {pwaints.swrt ((a ، b) => a.x - b.x) ؛kryb kryb waps (pwaints ، 0 ، pwaints۔ lmbaiy - 1) ؛} // msaal kay astamal: kanst pwaints: pwaint [] = [{x: 2 ، y: 3} ، {x: 12 ، y: 30} ، {x: 40 ، Y: 50} ، {x: 5 ، Y: 1} ، {x: 12 ، y: 10} ، {x: 3 ، y: 4} ،] ؛ mndastyns = kryb trien (pwaints) ؛ knswl۔lagh ('kryb trien jwray ka fasalha:' ، zahan sazay) ؛ is aml main ، nktaha antrfys 2D jghha main ayk nktaha ki nmaindghy krta hay ، js main X aur Y kwaardaynyt hawtay hayn۔ fasalay ki tkryb fasalay kay farmwlay ka astamal karty hoey do pwaints kay mabyn yklydayn fasalay ka hasab lghaty haay۔ayk haylpr fnkshn hay jo brwt fwrs kay nktaha nzar ka astamal karty hoey bohat kam pwaints kay darmiyan kryb trien jwray kay fasalay ka hasab lghata haay۔ astrp klwsyst fnkshn ayk aur mddghar fnkshn hay jo ayk dyiay gaye chwraaiy ki pty main mwjwd pwaints kay darmiyan kryb trien jwray kay fasalay ka hasab lghata haay۔fnkshn hay

Question: spwrt wyktr mshynwn (ays wy aym) aur is kay aham pyramytrza kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ykyna!taip askrpt main by try dayta dahanchay ka nfaza yahan haay: taip askrpt kwpy kwdaklas btrynwda <T> {chabyan: ty [] ؛bchay: btreenode <t> [] ؛aslyf: bwlyn ؛knstrktr (slyf: bwlyn) {this.keys = [] ؛this.children = [] ؛this.isleaf = sileaf ؛}} klas btree <t> {jra: btreenode <t> ؛daghry: nmbr ؛knstrktr (daghry: nmbr) {this.root = null ؛this.degree = daghry ؛} tlash (klyd: ty): bwlyn {as ko waps kryn۔} dakhl karain (klyd: ty): batal {aghr (this.root === null) {this.root = nya Btreenode <T> (sch) ؛this.root.keys.push (key) ؛} dusri {aghr (this.root.keys.length === (2 * this.degree) - 1) {const newrot = new Btreenode <T> (ghlta) ؛newrot.children.push (this.root) ؛this.splichild (newrot ، 0 ، this.root) ؛this.root = newrot ؛} this.insertnonfull (this.root ، key) ؛}} praiywyt srch nwda (nwda: Btreenode <T> ، key: t): bwlyn {aaiyay i = 0 ؛jbkha (i <node.keys.length && & key> node.keys [i]) {i ++ ؛} if (i <node.keys.length && & & key === nwda.kys [i]) {sch waps ؛} if (node.isleaf) {jhwty lwt ؛this is ko waps kryn۔} njy Insertnonfull (nwda: btreenode <t> ، key: t): batal {aaiyay i = node.keys.length - 1 ؛if (node.isleaf) {jbkha (i> = 0 && & & key <node.keys [i]) {node.keys [i + 1] = node.keys [i] ؛myn--؛} node.keys [i + 1] = klyd ؛} dusri {jbkha (i> = 0 && & & key <node.keys [i]) {i-- ؛} i ++ ؛if (node.children [i] .keys.length === (2 * this.degree) - 1) {this.splitchild (nwda ، i ، nwda.chaldayn [i]) ؛if (key> node.keys [i]) {i ++ ؛}} this.insertnonfull (node.children [i] ، klyd) ؛}} njy asplchylda (waldyn: Btreenode <T> ، andayks: nmbr ، bchha: Btreenode <T>): batal {const newnode = nya Btreenode <T> (child.isleaf) ؛pyrnt.Keys.splice (andayks ، 0 ، child.keys [this.degree - 1]) ؛pyrnt.krynyn.splys (andayks + 1 ، 0 ، nyw nwda) ؛newnode.keys = child.keys.splice (this.degree ، this.degree - 1) ؛if (! child.isleaf) {newnode.children = child.children.splice (this.degree ، this.degree) ؛}}} // msaal kay tawr par astamal: kanst btree = new btree <bunds> (3) ؛ btree.insert (5) ؛ btree.insert (10) ؛ btree.insert (3) ؛ btree.insert (1) ؛ btree.dakhl karain (7) ؛ knswl.lwgh (btree.search (3)) ؛// aaؤt pt: trueconsole.log (btree.search (6)) ؛// aaؤt pt: is par aml draamd ko fal karain ، Btreenode klas B-Tree main ayk nwda ki nmaindghy krta haay۔as main chabyan ki ayk saf ، chailda nwdas ki ayk saf hay ، aur ayk jhndaa is bat ki nshandhay krta hay keh aya nwda ayk pty nwda haay۔ by try klas by try dayta dahanchay ki nmaindghy krty haay۔as main jra ka nwda aur ayk daghry hay jo hr nwda main zayada sy zayada chabyan ka tayn krty haay۔

Question: fychr anjynirngh ka mksad kya hay aur kon sy tknyk astamal ki jaskty haay؟
Answer: ykyna!taip askrpt main ghraf kay kam sy kam phylnay waly drkht (MST) tlash karnay kay liye krskl kay alghwrthm ka ayk msaal aml haay: taip askrpt kwpy kwdaklas ywnyn fainda {waldyn: nmbr [] ؛drjha: nmbr [] ؛knstrktr (saiza: nmbr) {this.Pearnt = nya srny (saiza) ؛this.rank = niy saf (saiza) ؛kay liye (aaiyay i = 0 ؛ i <saiza ؛ i ++) {this.peart [i] = i ؛this.rank [i] = 0 ؛}} tlash karain (x: nmbr): nmbr {if (this.palent [x]! == x) {this.palent [x] = this.find (this.palent [x]) ؛this is ko waps kryn۔ waldyn [x] ؛} ywnyn (x: nmbr ، Y: nmbr): batal {const rootx = this.find (x) ؛kanst rwt = this.find (y) ؛aghr (rwt ayks! == rwt) {aghr (this.rank [rwt ayks] <this.rank [rwt]) {this.palent [rwt ayks] = rwt ؛} dusri sawrt main agar (this.rank [rwt ayks]> yha۔ rynk [rwt]) {this.peart [rwt] = rwt ayks ؛} else {this.pearnt [rwt] = rwt ayks ؛this.rank [rootx] ++ ؛}}}} klas ayj {makhza: nmbr ؛mnzal: nmbr ؛wzan: tadad ؛tamyr knndha (makhza: nmbr ، mnzal: nmbr ، wzan: nmbr) {this.source = makhza ؛this.destination = mnzal ؛yha۔ wzan = wzan ؛class} klas ghraf {knarwn: knaray [] ؛knstrktr () {this.edges = [] ؛} aydaj (makhza: nmbr ، mnzal: nmbr ، wzan: nmbr): batal {kant ayj = nya knaray (makhza ، mnzal ، wzan) ؛this.edges.push (knaray) ؛} krsklmst (): ayj [] {this.edges.sort ((a ، b) => a.weight - b.weight) ؛kanst ywnyn fainda = nya ywnyn fainda (this.edges.length) ؛kanst aym ays ty: ayj [] = [] ؛kay liye (as kay liay۔kwnt rwtstynyshn = ywnyn fainda.fainda (ayj.daystynyshn) ؛aghr (rwt swrs! == rwt dastynyshn) {MST.push (knaray) ؛ywnyn fainda daat ywn (rwt swrs ، rwt dastynyshn) ؛}} wapsy MST ؛}} // msaal kay tawr par astamal: kanst ghraf = nya ghraf () ؛ ghraf.adayj (0 ، 1 ، 4) ؛ ghraf.dayj (0 ، 7 ، 8) ؛ ghraf.dayj (1 ، 2 ، 8) ؛ ghraf۔aydajda (1 ، 7 ، 11) ؛ ghraf.dayj (2 ، 3 ، 7) ؛ ghraf.dayj (2 ، 8 ، 2) ؛ ghraf.adayj (2 ، 5 ، 4) ؛ ghraf.adayj (3 ، 4 ،9) ؛ ghraf.dayj (3 ، 5 ، 14) ؛ ghraf.dayj (4 ، 5 ، 10) ؛ ghraf.adayj (5 ، 6 ، 2) ؛ ghraf.adayj (6 ، 7 ، 1) ؛ ghraf۔ aydajdaj.lagh (`$ {Edge.Source} - $ {Edge.destination} ، wzan: $ {ayj. wyt}`) ؛} is nfaza main ، ywnyn fainda klas rynk kay zaryaha ywnyn ft kmpryshn aur ywnyn kay sath ywnyn ft dayta dahanchay ki nmaindghy krta haay۔as ka astamal alghwrthm kay doran naghwar sytwn par nzar rkhnay kay liye kya jata haay۔ knaray ki klas ghraf main ayk knaray ki nmaindghy krty hay ، js main makhza wrtyks ، mnzal mksawd aur wzan ko zakhyrha kya jata haay۔

Question: bay zuabtaghy ka ptha lghanay kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur is mksad kay liye astamal hony wali tknyk ki ayk msaal pysh kryn۔
Answer: ykyna!taip askrpt main tryp dayta dahanchay ka nfaza yahan haay: taip askrpt kwpy kwdaklas tryp nwda <T> {klyd: nmbr ؛kymt: ty ؛trjyha: nmbr ؛baiyn: tryp nwda <t> |khaly؛daiyn: tryp nwda <t> |khaly؛knstrktr (klyd: nmbr ، kdr: t) {this.key = key ؛this.value = value ؛this.priority = math.random () ؛this.left = null ؛this.right = null ؛class} klas tryp <t> {jra: tryp nwda <t> |khaly؛knstrktr () {this.root = null ؛} praiywyt rwtyt lft (nwda: tryp nwda <t>): tryp nwda <t> {kwnt raitchaida = nwda. rait !؛node.right = rightild.left ؛raitchlda daat lyft = nwda ؛raitaida waps ؛} njy rwtyrait (nwda: tryp nwda <T>): tryp nwda <T> {kanstyt lyftaida = nwda۔ lyft !؛node.left = lifthild.right ؛baiyn bchay۔ rait = nwda ؛baiyn bazaw ki wapsy ؛} njy dakhlha (nwda: tryp nwda <T> | NULL ، KEY: nmbr ، kdr: T): tryp nwda <T> {aghr (nwda === NULL) {nya tryp nwda <T> (klydy ، kdr) waps lwtaiyn ؛} if (key <node.key) {node.left = this.insertnode (node.left ، key ، value) ؛aghr (nwda.lft!}} dusri sawrt main agar (key> nwda.ky) {nwda۔ rait = this.insertnode (nwda. rait ، klyd ، kdr) ؛if (node.right! .priority <node.priority) {nwda = this.rotateleft (nwda) ؛}} wapsy nwda ؛} dakhl karain (klyd: nmbr ، kdr: ty): batal {this.root = this.insertnode (this.root ، klyd ، kdr) ؛} njy daylytynwda (nwda: tryp nwda <t> | null ، key: nmbr): tryp nwda <T> |null {if (nwda === null) {wapsy NULL ؛} if (key <node.key) {node.left = this.deletenode (node.left ، key) ؛} dusri sawrt main agar (key> nwda.ky) {nwda. rait = this.deletenode (node.right ، key) ؛} else {if (node.left === null && node.right === null) {waps waps ؛} wrnha agar (node.left === null) {nwda = this.rotateleft (nwda) ؛} wrnha agar (nwda.rait === null) {nwda = this.rotateright (nwda) ؛} else {if (node.left.priority <node.right.priority) {nwda = this.rotateright (nwda) ؛} dusri {nwda = this.rotateleft (nwda) ؛}} nwda = this.deletenode (nwda ، klyd) ؛} wapsy nwda ؛} hazaf karain (klyd: nmbr): batal {this.root = this.deletenode (this.root ، key) ؛} njy srch nwda (nwda: tryp nwda <t> | null ، key: nmbr): t |null {if (nwda === null) {wapsy NULL ؛} if (key === node.key) {wapsy nwda.wlyw ؛} dusri sawrt main agar (klyd <nwda.ky) {as ki tlash kryn۔} else {as ko waps kryn۔ srchnwda (nwda. rait ، klyd) ؛}} tlash (klyd: nmbr): ty |null {as ko waps kryn۔ srchnwda (this.root ، key) ؛}} // msaal kay tawr par astamal: const tryp = nya tryp <strngh> () ؛ tryp.nsrt (5 ، "aypl") ؛ try

Question: mshyn lrnngh main nksaan kay afaal ka kya krdar hay aur kuch aam tawr par astamal hony waly nksaan kay afaal kya hayn؟
Answer: ykyna!taip askrpt ka astamal karty hoey tarwn ki ayk saf kay darmiyan sab sy tawyl mshtrkha sabkha tlash karnay kay liye ayk msaal ka prwghram yeh haay: taip askrpt kwpy kwdafkshn tawyl trien kamwmn pryfks (ays ty aar ays: strngh []): strngh {aghr (str.length === 0) {wapsy '' ؛pref lyt pryfks = strs [0] ؛kay liye (i = 1 ؛ i <str.length ؛ i ++) {jbkha (strs [i]. indexof (sabkha)! == 0) {pryfks = pryfks.swbstrngh (0 ، sabkha۔ lmbaiy - 1) ؛aghr (sabkha === '') {waps '' ؛}}} wapsy ka sabkha ؛} // msaal kay astamal: kanstwr astrnghza = ['phwl' ، 'flw' ، 'flait'] const const mshtrkha pryfks = tawyl trien kamwmn pryfks (dawr) ؛ knswl.lwgh ('sb sy tawyl aam pryfks:' ، kamn prfks)؛// aaؤt pt: "FL" is prwghram main ، tawyl arsaay sy kam karnay wala fnkshn un pt kay tawr par tar ki ayk saf lyta hay aur un main sab sy tawyl aam sabkha waps krta haay۔ fnkshn srny main pehli tar kay sath sabkha mtghyr ko shrwa krta haay۔as kay bad ، yeh baky dawrwn kay zaryaay tkrar krta hay aur chyk krta hay keh agar andayksf tarykha astamal karty hoey hr tar ka sabkha ayk sabkha haay۔aghr pryfks kesi tar ka sabkha nahin hay tou ، yeh sabkha kay aakhry krdar ko hatata hay aur is aml ko jary rakhy ga jab tak keh ayk mshtrkha sabkha mil jata hay ya sabkha khaly nahin hawjata haay۔aghr koi mshtrkha sabkha mwjwd nahin hay tou khaly tar۔

Question: kras twsayk ka astamal karty hoey madal kay antkhab aur tshkhysa kay aml ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ykyna!taip askrpt main rsy kay dayta dahanchay ka nfaza yahan haay: taip askrpt kwpy kwdaklas rwpynwda {baiyn: rwpynwda |tar ؛daiyn: rwpynwda |tar ؛wzan: tadad ؛knstrktr (baiyn: rwpynwda | strngh ، daiyn: rwpynwda | strngh) {this.left = baien ؛this.right = dien ؛this.weight = this.calculateweitt () ؛} njy hasab ktab (): nmbr {if (type of this.left === 'strngh') {as ko waps kryn۔} dusri {as ko waps kryn۔}}} klas rsy {jra: rwpynwda |tar ؛knstrktr (jra: rwpynwda | strngh) {this.root = jra ؛} praiywyt kwnktnwdas (nwda 1: rwpynwda | strngh ، nwda 2: rwpynwda | strngh): rwpynwda {nya rwpynwda waps karain (nwda 1 ، nwda 2) ؛} njy asplt nwda (nwda: rwpynwda ، andayks: nmbr): [rwpnwda |strngh ، rwpynwda |strngh] {if (index === 0) {wapsy [node.left ، node.right] ؛} dusri sawrt main agar (asharyha === nwda۔ wyt) {wapsy [nwda ، ''] ؛} wrnha agar (taipwf nwda۔ lyft === 'strngh') {kwnst lyftsbstrngh = nwda.lft.swbstrngh (0 ، andayks) ؛knst raitsbstrngh = nwda۔ lyft.swbstrngh (andayks) ؛wapsy [lyftsbstrngh ، raitsbstrngh + nwda۔ rait] ؛} wrnha agar (index <node.left.weight) {const [leftsplit ، hakwk plt] = this.splitnode (node.left as ropenode ، andayks) ؛wapsy [leftsplit ، this.concatnodes (hakwk ki jghha ، nwda. rait)] ؛} else {const [leftsplit ، hakwk plt] = this.splitnode (nwda۔ ropenode ، andayks - node.left.weight) ؛waps [this.concatnodes (node.left ، leftsplit) ، hakwk ki jghha] ؛}} dakhl karain (asharyha: nmbr ، mtn: strngh): batal {kanst [baiyn ، daiyn] = this.splitnode (yha.rwt btawr rwpynwda ، andayks) ؛const newnode = this.concatnodes (baiyn ، this.concatnodes (mtn ، daiyn)) ؛this.root = newnode ؛} hazaf karain (asharyha: nmbr ، lmbaiy: nmbr): batal {Const [baiyn 1 ، dien 1] = this.splitnode (yha.rwt btawr rwpynwda ، andayks) ؛kanst [baiyn 2 ، dien 2] = this.splitnode (daiyn 1 jesay rwpynwda ، lmbaiy) ؛this.root = this.concatnodes (baiyn 1 ، dien 2) ؛} tastrngh (): strngh {kanstngh ntyjha: strngh [] = [] ؛Const traverse = (nwda: rwpynwda | strngh) => {if (typeof nwda === 'strngh') {ntyjha. psh (nwda) ؛} else {traverse (node.left) ؛traverse (node.right) ؛}} ؛traverse (this.root) ؛wapsy ka ntyjha۔ join ('') ؛}} // msaal kay tawr par astamal: kwnst rsy = niy rsy (nya rwpynwda ('haylw ،' ، 'wrlda!')) ؛ rope.insert (7 ، 'khwbsawrt') ؛ rope.delete (0 ، 7) ؛ knswl۔lagh (rope.tostring ()) ؛// aaؤt pt: "khwbsawrt dnya!" is nfaza main ، rwpynwda klas rsy main ayk nwda ki nmaindghy krty hay ، js main ya tou tar (pty nwda) hawskta hay ya do bchwn kay nwdas (andrwny nwda) ka hawalha hawskta haay۔har nwda main ayk wzan ki praprty bhi hawty hay jo is nwda main zakhyrha shuda astrngh ki lmbaiy ki nmaindghy krty haay۔ rsy ki klas rsy kay aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay ki nmaindghy krty hay aur mkhsawsa asharywn par mtn ko dakhl karnay aur hazaf karnay kay tarykay mhaya krty hay ، aur sath hi rsy ko tar ki nmaindghy main tbdyl krty haay۔dakhl karnay ka tarykha mkhsawsa andayks par rsy ko alag krta hay ، niay mtn ko alyhadha nwda kay tawr par dakhl krta hay ، aur phir nwdas ko ayk sath mil jata haay۔

Question: mshyn lrnngh main L1 aur L2 ko bakaadha bnanay main kya frk haay؟
Answer: ykyna!taip askrpt main byl myn fwrda alghwrthm ka nfaza yahan haay: taip askrpt kwpy kwdaklas ayj {makhza: nmbr ؛mnzal: nmbr ؛wzan: tadad ؛tamyr knndha (makhza: nmbr ، mnzal: nmbr ، wzan: nmbr) {this.source = makhza ؛this.destination = mnzal ؛yha۔ wzan = wzan ؛class} klas ghraf {amwdy: nmbr ؛knarwn: knaray [] ؛knstrktr (amwdy: nmbr) {this.vertices = amwdy ؛this.edges = [] ؛} aydaj (makhza: nmbr ، mnzal: nmbr ، wzan: nmbr): batal {kant ayj = nya knaray (makhza ، mnzal ، wzan) ؛this.edges.push (knaray) ؛man byl myn fwrda (astartwrtyks: nmbr): nmbr [] {knst dastns: nmbr [] = nya srny (yha ۔wrtaits)fasalha [astartwrtyks] = 0 ؛kay liye (aaiyay i = 0 ؛ i <this.vertices - 1 ؛ i ++) {kay liye (as kay liay۔aghr (fasalha [makhza]! == nmbr.myks_wylyw && fasalha [makhza] + wzan <fasalha [mnzal]) {fasalha [mnzal] = fasalha [makhza] + wzan ؛}}} for (this.edges kay kwnst ayj) {const {makhza ، mnzal ، wzan} = knaray ؛aghr (fasalha [makhza]! == nmbr.myks_wylyw && fasalha [makhza] + wzan <fasalha [mnzal]) {niy ghltay phynk dyn ('ghraf main mnfy wzan ka chkr hawta haay') ؛}} wapsy ka fasalha ؛}} // msaal kay tawr par astamal: kanst ghraf = nya ghraf (5) ؛ ghraf.dayj (0 ، 1 ، 4) ؛ ghraf.dayj (0 ، 2 ، 3) ؛ ghraf.adayj (1 ، 2 ، -2) ؛ghraf.adayj (1 ، 3 ، 4) ؛ ghraf.dayj (1 ، 4 ، 2) ؛ ghraf.dayj (3 ، 2 ، 1) ؛ ghraf.adayj (3 ، 1 ، 5) ؛ ghraf.adayj (4 ،3 ، -3) ؛ kanst astartwrtyks = 0 ؛ kanstlst dastns = ghraf.byl myn fwrda (astartwrtyks) ؛ knswl.lwgh ('wrtyks sy mkhtsar fasalha' ، astartwrtyks) ؛ kay liye (i = 0 ؛ i <sharst dastyns.lnth ؛ i ++){knswl.lagh ('wrtyks' ، i ، ':' ، mkhtsar trien [i]) ؛} is aml main ، ayj klas ghraf main ayk knaray ki nmaindghy krta hay ، js main ayk makhza wrtyks ، mnzal mksawd ، aur wzan hawta haay۔ ghraf klasayk hadayt namha ghraf ki nmaindghy krta hay aur kesi dyiay gaye astart aykstryks sy mkhtsar trien fasalwn ko tlash karnay kay liye knarwn ko shaml karnay aur byl myn fwrda alghwrthm ko anjam denay kay tarykay mhaya krta haay۔ byl myn fwrda ka tarykha astart wrtyks sy mkhtsar fasalay ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye ayk saf ka fasalha shrwa krta haay۔as kay bad is ki tkrar hawty haay۔as kay bad ، yeh ghraf main mnfy wzan kay chkrwn ki janch pratal krta haay۔aghr mnfy wzan ka chkr mil jata hay tou ، ayk ghltay phynk di jati haay۔ fainl tawr par ، prwghram ghraf klas kay astamal ko ghraf bna kar ، knarwn ko shaml krkay ، aur byl myn fwrda alghwrthm chlanay sy zaahar krta hay takha ayk mkhsawsa astart wrtyks sy mkhtsar trien fasalwn ko tlash kya jaskay۔as kay bad klyl trien fasalwn ko knswl par chhpaya jata haay۔

Question: kdrty zaban prwsysngh kay kamwn main lfza aymbydangh kay tsawr aur un kay astamal ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ykyna!taip askrpt main wkfha kay drkht kay aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay ka nfaza yahan haay: taip askrpt kwpy kwdaklas wkfha {km: nmbr ؛aaly: nmbr ؛knstrktr (km: nmbr ، aaly: nmbr) {this.low = kam ؛this.high = aaly ؛class} klas antrwltrynwda {wkfha: wkfha ؛zayadha sy zayadha: nmbr ؛baiyn: antraltrynwda |khaly؛daiyn: antraltrynwda |khaly؛knstrktr (wkfha: wkfha) {this.interval = wkfha ؛this.max = wkfha۔ haaiy ؛this.left = null ؛this.right = null ؛class} klas antrwltry {jra: antrwyltrynwda |khaly؛knstrktr () {this.root = null ؛} praiywyt ghyt myks (A: nmbr ، B: nmbr ، C: nmbr): nmbr {rytrn myth۔ myks (A ، Math.max (B ، C)) ؛} njy Insertnode (nwda: antrwyltrynwda | NULL ، wkfha: wkfha): antrwyltrynwda {aghr (nwda ==== null) {nya antrwyltrynwda (wkfha) waps karain ؛} const {km} = wkfha ؛aghr (km <node.interval.low) {node.left = this.insertnode (node.left ، wkfha) ؛} else {node.right = this.insertnode (node.right ، wkfha) ؛} node.max = this.getMax (node.max ، wkfha. haaiy ، nwda. interval.high) ؛wapsy nwda ؛} dakhl karain (wkfha: wkfha): batal {this.root = this.insertnode (this.root ، wkfha) ؛} njy dawwrlap (wkfha 1: wkfha ، wkfha 2: wkfha): bwlyn {rytrn antrwywyl 1.low <= intraval2.high && interval2.low <= introal1.high ؛} njy srch awwrlypngh antrwlza (nwda: antrwyltrynwda | NULL ، wkfha: wkfha ، ntyjha: wkfha []): batal {aghr (nwda === null) {wapsy ؛} if (this.dooverlap (node.interval ، wkfha)) {ntyjha. psh (node.interval) ؛} agar (nwda.lft!} if (node.right! == null && node.right.Interval.low <= interval.high) {this.searchoverlapping intervals (nwda.rait ، wkfha ، ntyjha) ؛}} tlash (wkfha: wkfha): wkfha [] {kanstngh ntyjha: wkfha [] = [] ؛this.searchoverlapping intervals (this.root ، wkfha ، ntyjha) ؛wapsy ka ntyjha ؛}} // msaal kay tawr par astamal: kanst antrwwltry = nya antrwwltry () ؛ antrwwltry.srt (nya wkfha (15 ، 20)) inter antrwwltry.srt (nya wkfha (10 ، 30)) inter antrwwltry.nst (nya wkfha (5 ،20)) inter antrwwltry۔ INSERT (nya wkfha (12 ، 15)) inter antrwwltry.srt (nya wkfha (17 ، 19)) inter antrwwltry.srt (nya wkfha (30 ، 40)) const kans srchyntrwl = nya wkfha (14، ، 16) const vorelapping intervals = intervaltree.search (srchyntywrwl) ؛ knswl.lwgh ('awwr lypngh wkfay kay sath awwrlypngh wkfay' ، srch antrwwl ، ':') ؛ awwrlypngh antrwiwlza۔ farwrch ((wkfha) => {knswl۔.low ، '،' ، wkfha. HIGH ، ']') ؛}) ؛ is aml main ، wkfha tabkha ayk wkfha ki nmaindghy krta hay js main kam aur aaly kymt hawty haay۔wkfay kay drkht main ayk nwda ki nmaindghy krta hay ، js main wkfha hawta hay ، is kay wkfha aur awlad main zayada sy zayada kymt hawty hay ، aur baien aur dien bchay kay nwdas ka hawalha hawta haay۔ antrltry klas wkfha drkht kay aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay ki nmaindghy krta hay aur wkfwn ko dakhl karnay kay tarykay mhaya krta hay awr۔awwrlypngh wkfwn ki tlash kryn۔ dakhl karnay ka tarykha mwjwdha nwda kay wkfha kam kymt kay sath is ki kam kymt ka mwazanha krkay wkfha kay drkht main wkfha dakhl krta haay۔yha nwda ki zayada sy zayada aaly kymt ko ap dayt krta hay aur

Question: trtyb ki pysh ghwiy kay liye bar bar nywrl nyt wrk (RNN) ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ykyna!yhaan ayk taip askrpt prwghram ki ayk msaal hay jo ghraf par chwraaiy ki pehli tlash krty haay: taip askrpt kwpy kwdaklas ghraf {mlhakha lst: rykarda <strngh ، strngh []> ؛knstrktr () {this.adjacencyList = {} ؛} aydawrtyks (wrtyks: strngh) {if (! this.adjacencyList [vertex]) {this.adjacencyList [vertex] = [] ؛}} aydaj (wrtyks 1: strngh ، wrtyks 2: strngh) {this.adjacencyList [vertex1] .push (vertex2) ؛this.adjacencyList [vertex2] .Push (vertex1) ؛} brydahfyrst srch (astartwrtyks: strngh) {knst mlahazaha kryn: rykarda <strngh ، bwlyn> = {} ؛kanst ktaar: strngh [] = [] ؛kanstngh ntyjha: strngh [] = [] ؛dwrha [astartwrtyks] = sch ؛ktaar.psh (astartwrtyks) ؛jbkha (ktaar۔ lmbaiy) {mwjwdha mwjwdhawrtyks = ktaar۔ shft () !؛ntyjha۔ psh (krntwrtyks) ؛this.adjacencyList [krnttwrtyks] .foreach ((prawsy) => {aghr (! mlahazaha kya [prawsy]) {mlahazaha kya [prawsy] = sch ؛ ktaar.psh (prawsy) ؛}}) ؛} wapsy ka ntyjha ؛}} // msaal kay tawr par astamal: kanst ghraf = nya ghraf () ؛ ghraf.adawrtyks ("A") ؛ ghraf.adawrtyks ("by") ؛ ghraf.adatwrtyks ("sy") ؛ ghraf.adatwrtyks ("day")؛ ghraf.adawrtyks ("ay") ؛ ghraf.adayj ("aay" ، "by") ؛ ghraf.dayj ("aay" ، "sy") ؛ ghraf.dayj ("by" ، "day") ؛ ghraf.Addedge ("C" ، "E") ؛ knswl.lwgh (ghraf.brydahfyrst srch ("A")) ؛// aaؤt pt: ['A' ، 'B' ، 'C' ، 'D' ، 'E'] is msaal main ، hum ghraf main amwdy aur knarwn ko shaml karnay kay tarykwn kay sath ghraf klas ki wzuahat karty hayn۔chwraaiy ki tlash ka tarykha kesi dyiay gaye wrtyks sy shrwa hony wali chwraaiy ki pehli tlash ko anjam dyta haay۔as main dwrha shuda chshmwn ka sragh lghanay kay liye mlahazaha ki hogi shay ka astamal kya jata hay ، dwray kay liye amwdy ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye ayk ktaar saf ، aur mlahazaha karnay waly amwdywn kay aardar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye ntyjha sray۔ hum ghraf klas ki ayk niy msaal bnaiyn aur is main amwdy aur knarwn ko shaml kryn۔as kay bad ، hum "A" kay abtdaiy had kay sath brydathfyrst srch tarykha ko kehty hain aur is kay ntyjay main lagh un kryn۔ prwghram ki aaؤt pt ['a' ، 'b' ، 'c' ، 'd' ، 'e'] hawghy۔as trtyb ki nmaindghy krta hay js main chwraaiy ki pehli tlash kay doran amwdy ka dwrha kya gaya tha۔

Question: prnspl jzaw tjzayha (py sy aay) kay tsawr aur jhaty main kami main is kay krdar ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ykyna!taip askrpt main ayk msaal ka prwghram yeh hay keh is bat ka tayn karnay kay liye keh aya do bainry drkht ayk jesay hayn: taip askrpt kwpy kwdaklas trynwda {kdr: nmbr ؛baiyn: trynwda |khaly؛daiyn: trynwda |khaly؛knstrktr (kdr: nmbr) {this.value = value ؛this.left = null ؛this.right = null ؛}} fnkshn aarytryjstynykl (try 1: trynwda | nwl ، try 2: trynwda | nwl): bwlyn {// bys kysza: agar dono drkht kaladm hain tou ، woh ayk jesay hain agar (try 1 === nulsch ؛} // agar ayk drkht kaladm hay aur dusra nahin hay tou ، woh ayk jesay nahin hain agar (try 1 === null || drkht 2 === null) {ghlta waps ؛} // chyk karain keh aya mwjwdha nwda ki akdar brabr hain ، aur un kay baien aur dien sbtryza ki wapsy (treath1.value === tree2.value && aretreasidentical (treath1.left ، tree2.left) && aretresidentical (treath1.right ، drkht 2. rait)) ؛} // msaal kay tawr par astamal: // drkht 1 kwnst try 1 = nya trynwda (1) ؛ try 1. lyft = nya trynwda (2) ؛ try 1. rait = nya trynwda (3) ؛ try 1.left.left = nyatreenode (4) ؛ trease1.left.right = nya trynwda (5) // drkht 2 (drkht sy mlta jlta hay 1) kanst try 2 = nya trynwda (1) ؛ drkht 2. lyft = nya trynwda (2) ؛ try 2. rait =nya trynwda (3) tree drkht 2.left.left = nya trynwda (4) ؛ try 2.left.right = nya trynwda (5) ؛ knswl.lwgh (aryt ryzaydaynykl (try 1 ، try 2)) ؛// aaؤt pt: try // drkht 3 (drkht sy mkhtlf dahanchha 1) kanst try 3 = nya trynwda (1) ؛ try 3. lyft = nya trynwda (2) ؛ try 3. rait = nya trynwda (3) ؛ try 3.left.right= nya trynwda (4) ؛ try 3. rait.lyft = nya trynwda (5) ؛ knswl.lwgh (aarytry aysdaynykl (try 1 ، try 3)) ؛// aaؤt pt: is msaal kay tawr par ، hum bainry drkht main nwda ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye ayk trynwda klas ki wzuahat karty hayn۔har nwda ki ayk kymt ، ayk baien bchha ، aur ayk dien bchha hawta haay۔ arytrysydaynykl fnkshn do bainry drkhtwn ko un pt (try 1 aur try 2) kay tawr par lyta hay aur agar drkht ayk jesay aur ghalat hain tou woh sch saabt hawta haay۔yha drkhtwn kay nwdas ka mwazanha karnay kay liye ayk tkrar nktaha nzar ka astamal krta haay۔ fnkshn pehlay bys kyswn ki janch pratal krta haay: agar dono drkht kaladm hain tou woh ayk jesay hain (bys kys 1)۔aghr ayk drkht kaladm hay aur dusra nahin hay tou ، woh ayk jesay nahin hain (bys kys 2). agar mzakwrha bala bys maamlat pori nahin kyay jatay hain tou ، fnkshn try 1 aur try 2 ki mwjwdha nwda akdar ka mwazanha krta haay۔aghr woh brabr hain tou ، yeh bar bar dono drkhtwn kay baien sbtrywn aur dien sab trywn kay liye arytrysydaynykl kehty hayn۔aghr yeh sari bar bar kalyn drst lwtty hain tou phir drkhtwn ko yksan smjha jata haay۔ msaal kay tawr par astamal kay hasaay main ، hum tyn bainry drkht bnatay hayn: try 1 ، try 2 ، aur try 3۔try 1 aur try 2 main ayk hi dahanchha aur akdar hain ، lhazaa fnkshn kal aarytyrysydaynykl (try 1 ، try 2) ko drst lwtta haay۔taham ، try 3 try 1 sy ayk mkhtlf dahanchha rkhta hay ، lhazaa fnkshn kal aarytyrysydaynykl (try 1 ، try 3) ghalat lwtta haay۔

staha main nya nwda dakhl karain (aaiyay i = this.maxlevel-1 ؛ i> = 0 ؛ i--) {mwjwdha = rastha [i] ؛Const newnode = nya askyplstnwda (kdr) ؛aghr (insertabove) {newnode.down = daaؤn nwda ؛daawn nwda = newnode ؛} newnode.next = mwjwdha. nykst ؛mwjwdha۔ nykst = nyw nwda ؛// tsaadfy tawr par fysalha karain keh aya Insertabove = math.random () <this.levelprobability kay upar ki staha dakhl karna hay ya nhayn۔}} tlash (kymt: nmbr): bwlyn {aaiyay mwjwdha = this.head ؛// kymt ko tlash karnay kay liye askyp lst ko abwr karain jabky (mwjwdha) {aghr (mwjwdha.Value === wylyw) {sch waps ؛} dusri sawrt main agar (mwjwdha۔ nykst === nwl} else {mwjwdha = mwjwdha. nykst ؛}} ghalat lwtaiyn ؛}} // msaal kay tawr par astamal: kwnst askyplst = nya askyplst () ؛ askyplst.nsrt (3) ؛ askyplst.nsrt (1) ؛ askyplst.srt (4) ؛ askyplst.srt (2) ؛ knswl.lwgh (askyplst.charch۔(2)) ؛// aaؤt pt: trueconsole.log (skiplist.search (5)) ؛// aaؤt pt: is aasan aml ko nfaza main ، hamary pas do klas hayn: askyplstnwda askyp lst main ayk nwda ki nmaindghy krta hay ، aur askyplst askyp lst dayta dahanchay ki nmaindghy krta haay۔ askyplstnwda klas main tyn khsawsayat hayn: nwda ki kymt ، aghlay pwaints aghlay pwaints kay pas haay۔nwda ayk hi staha main ، aur nechay ki staha main nwda ki taraf asharha karty hayn۔ askyplst klas main tyn khsawsayat hayn: askyp lst kay awpry baien nwda ki taraf hayda pwaints ، mykslywl askyp lst kay liye zayada sy zayada staha ki nmaindghy krta hay (as maamlay main is maamlay myn، 16) ، aur lywlprwbyblty nwda kay aaly staha par hony kay amkanat ka tayn krty haay۔ dakhl karnay ka tarykha dakhl krta hay

Answer: ykyna!yhaan ayk taip askrpt prwghram ki ayk msaal hay jo ghraf par ghharaiy sy pehlay tlash krty haay: taip askrpt kwpy kwdaklas ghraf {mlhakha lst: rykarda <strngh ، strngh []> ؛knstrktr () {this.adjacencyList = {} ؛} aydawrtyks (wrtyks: strngh) {if (! Question: ayk ghrm ankwdangh kay tsawr aur is kay astamal kay mtghyr mtghyr ki nmaindghy karnay main is kay astamal ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ykyna!antyghrs ki ayk saf par anzumam karnay kay liye taip askrpt main ayk msaal ka prwghram yeh haay: taip askrpt kwpy kwdafkshn anzumam anzumam (ARR: nmbr []): nmbr [] {aghr (arr.length <= 1) {wapsy ARR ؛} kant mdal = ryazuy۔ flwr (arr.length / 2) ؛kanst lyftar = aar aar ays slais (0 ، drmyany) ؛kwnt rait aar = aar aar ays slais (drmyany) ؛const sootdleftarr = anzumam (baiyn bazaw) aay aar aar۔ psh (baiyn bazaw [baiyn andayks]) ؛baiyn andayks ++ ؛} dusri {anzumam.rait andayks ++ ؛}} // baien srny sy baky anasar shaml karain jabky (baiyn andayks <baiyn bazaw ki lmbaiy) {anzumam arr.push (lethar [lethar [lethindex]) ؛baiyn andayks ++ ؛} // baky anasar ko dien saf sy shaml karain jabky (rait andayks <rait aar. lmbaiy) {anzumam shdha۔rait andayks ++ ؛} waps anzumam}} // msaal kay tawr par astamal: Const arr = [8 ، 4 ، 2 ، 7 ، 1 ، 5 ، 9 ، 3 ، 6] const const shordarr = anzumam (arr) ؛ knswl.lwgh (trtybr) ؛// aaؤt pt: [1 ، 2 ، 3 ، 4 ، 5 ، 6 ، 7 ، 8 ، 9] is msaal main ، hamary do kam hayn: anzumam aur anzumam۔anzumam ki tkryb ayk saf lyty hay aur bar bar is ko do hasawn main tksym krty hay jab tak keh bys kys tak nah phanch jaye (yany ، saf main sirf ayk ya safr anasar hawtay hayn)۔as kay bad yeh anzumam ki tkryb ka astamal karty hoey trtyb shuda aadhaywn ko zum krta hay aur trtyb shuda saf ko waps krta haay۔ anzumam ki tkryb do trtyb shuda safwn (lyftyr aur rait aar) lyty hay aur inhain ayk hi trtyb shuda saf main zum krty haay۔yha dono safwn kay anasar ka mwazanha krta hay aur chhwtay ansar ko anzumam karnay wali srny main shaml krta hay jab tak keh tamam anasar ko zum nahin krdya jata۔ msaal kay tawr par astamal kay hasaay main ، hum ghair trtyb shuda add kay sath ayk saf aar aar bnatay hayn۔as kay bad hum anzumam par anzumam ko kal karty hain takha anzumam ki karkrdghy ka mzaaharha kya jaskay aur trtyb shuda ntyjha ko trtyb diya gaya haw۔aakhr main ، hum knswl main trtyb shuda srny chhantry ko prnt karty hayn۔

Question: drjha bndy kay liye spwrt wyktr mshyn (ays wy aym) ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ykyna!yhaan taip askrpt main try dayta dahanchay ka ayk msaal aml haay: taip askrpt kwpy kwdaklas tryny kwda {bchay: nkshha <strngh ، traiynwda> ؛isendofword: bwlyn ؛knstrktr () {this.children = nya nkshha () ؛this.isendofword = ghalat ؛class} klas try {jra: trainwda ؛knstrktr () {this.root = new trienode () ؛} dakhl karain (lfza: strngh) {mwjwdha = this.root ؛kay liye (aaiyay i = 0 ؛ i <wrda.lnth ؛ i ++) {const Char = wrda [i] ؛if (! mwjwdha.kryn. has (char)) {mwjwdha.chlryn.syt (char ، nya traiynwda ()) ؛} mwjwdha = krnt.krynyn.byt (char) !؛} mwjwdha.Isendofword = sch ؛} tlash (lfza: strngh): bwlyn {aaiyay mwjwdha = this.root ؛kay liye (aaiyay i = 0 ؛ i <wrda.lnth ؛ i ++) {const Char = wrda [i] ؛aghr (! mwjwdha۔ chaildaryn.haas (char)) {ghlta lwtaiyn ؛} mwjwdha = krnt.krynyn.byt (char) !؛current mwjwdha. aaisndafwrda ko lwtaiyn ؛} astart wyth (sabkha: strngh): bwlyn {aaiyay mwjwdha = this.root ؛kay liye (aaiyay i = 0 ؛ i <prefix.length ؛ i ++) {const char = prefix [i] ؛aghr (! mwjwdha۔ chaildaryn.haas (char)) {ghlta lwtaiyn ؛} mwjwdha = krnt.krynyn.byt (char) !؛} sch waps ؛}} // msaal kay tawr par astamal: const trie = new trie () ؛ trie.insert ("aypl") ؛ trie.insert ("kylay") ؛ trie.insert ("awrynj") ؛ knswl.lwgh (trie.search (trie.search ("syb"))؛// aaؤt pt: trueconsole.log (trie.search ("kylay")) ؛// aaؤt pt: trueconsole.log (trie.search ("awrnj")) ؛// aaؤt pt: trueconsole.log (trie.search ("anghwr")) ؛// aaؤt pt: falseconsole.log (trie.startswith ("app")) ؛// aaؤt pt: trueconsole.log (trie.startswith ("pabndy")) ؛// aaؤt pt: trueconsole.log (trie.startswith ("ya")) ؛// aaؤt pt: trueconsole.log (trie.startswith ("GR")) ؛// aaؤt pt: is msaal kay tawr par ، hamary pas do klas hayn: trynywda aur try۔traiynwda try main ayk nwda ki nmaindghy krta hay ، aur try try dayta dahanchay ki nmaindghy krty haay۔ traiynwda klas main do khsawsayat hayn: bchay ، jo ayk aysa nkshha hay jo mwjwdha nwda kay bchwn kay nwdas ko mhafwza krta hay ، aur aaisndawf wrda ، jo is bat ki nshandhay krta hay keh aya mwjwdha nwdaayk lfza kay akhttam ko nshan zad krta haay۔ try klas main ayk praprty ، jra hay ، jo try kay jra nwda ki nmaindghy krty haay۔as kay pas traiy main ayk lfza dakhl karnay ، traiy main ayk lfza tlash karnay kay liye tarykay dakhl karnay ، tlash karnay aur shrwa karnay waly tarykay hain ، aur yeh chyk karain keh kya try main koi lfza ya sabkha mwjwd haay۔ msaal kay tawr par astamal kay hasaay main ، hum ayk msaal tyar karty hayn۔traiy klas aur dakhl karnay kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey try main tyn alfaza ("aypl" ، "kylay" ، "awrynj") dakhl kryn۔as kay bad hum yeh chyk karnay kay liye tlash kay tarykha kar ka mzaaharha karty hain keh aya traiy aur astart wyth kay tarykha kar main mkhsawsa alfaza mwjwd hain ya nahin yeh chyk karnay kay liye keh aya traiy main mkhsawsa sabkha mwjwd hain ya nhayn۔ntaij knswl par chhapay gaye hayn۔

Question: aasaaby nyt wrks main darap aaؤt ryghwlaizayshn ka mksad kya hay aur yeh kesay kam krta haay؟
Answer: ykyna!taip askrpt main yahan ayk msaal prwghram hay js ka tayn karnay kay liye keh aya bainry try mtwazan haay: taip askrpt kwpy kwdaklas trynwda {kdr: nmbr ؛baiyn: trynwda |khaly؛daiyn: trynwda |khaly؛knstrktr (kdr: nmbr) {this.value = value ؛this.left = null ؛this.right = null ؛}} fnkshn isbalanced (jra: trynwda | null): bwlyn {aghr (jra ==== null) {sch waps ؛} const getheight = (nwda: treenode | null): nmbr => {aghr (nwda === null) {waps 0 ؛} kwnst lyft haait = getheight (node.left) ؛kanst rait haait = ghythait (nwda. rait) ؛waps myth۔ myks (baiyn bazaw ، rait haait) + 1 ؛} ؛const isbalancedhelper = (nwda: trynwda | null): bwlyn => {aghr (nwda ==== null) {sch waps ؛} kwnst lyft haait = getheight (node.left) ؛kanst rait haait = ghythait (nwda. rait) ؛kans awnchaiy daf = ryazuy۔ aay by ays (baiyn bazaw - rait haait) ؛aghr (awnchaiy daf> 1) {ghlta lwtyn ؛} isbalancedhelper (node.left) && isbalancedhelper (node.right) waps karain ؛} ؛isbalancedhelper (jra)} // msaal kay tawr par astamal: kanst rwt = nya trynwda (1) ؛ rwt. lyft = nya trynwda (2) ؛ rwt. rait = nya trynwda (3) ؛ rwt.lft!. lyft = nya trynwda(4) root rwt. lyft!// aaؤt pt: trueroot.right! .left = new Treenode (6) ؛ jra.aych!// aaؤt pt: is msaal kay tawr par ، hamary pas ayk trynwda klas hay jo bainry drkht main nwda ki nmaindghy krta haay۔isbalanced fnkshn bainry drkht ki jra nwda ko un pt kay tawr par la jata hay aur bwlyn ki kymt ko lwtata hay js sy yeh zaahar hawta hay keh drkht mtwazan hay ya nhayn۔ ghytait fnkshn is kay baien aur dien ki awnchaiy ka hasab ktab krkay drkht main dyiay gaye nwda ki awnchaiy ka hasab lghata haay۔sbtry۔yha baien aur dien sbtrys kay darmiyan zayada sy zayada awnchaiy lwtata hay ، nyza 1. is bylnsda haylpr fnkshn chyk krta hay agar is kay baien aur dien sbtrywn ki awnchaiywn ka mwazanha krkay nwda mtwazan haay۔aghr awnchaiywn kay mabyn mtalk frk 1 sy zayada hay tou ، yeh ghalat lwtta haay۔bsawrt dyghr ، yeh bar bar janch pratal krta hay keh aya baien aur dien sbtryza mtwazan hayn۔ msaal kay tawr par astamal kay hasaay main ، hum nwdas kay sath bainry try bnatay hain aur akdar tfwyzu karty hayn۔as kay bad hum is bat ka tayn karnay kay liye rwt nwda par islanced fnkshn ko kal karty hain keh drkht mtwazan hay ya nhayn۔ntaij knswl par chhapay gaye hayn۔

Question: pehlay sy trbyt yaftha madalza aur thyk twnngh ka astamal karty hoey mntkly kay sykhnay kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: do ktaarwn ka astamal karty hoey astyk par aml draamd anasar kay mrkzay zakhyrha karnay kay liye ayk ktaar aur maawn karrwaiywn kay liye dusri ktaar ka astamal krkay haasal kya jaskta haay۔taip askrpt main do ktaarwn ka astamal karty hoey astyk par aml draamd yahan haay: taip askrpt kwpy kwdaklas astyk {myn kywiw: nmbr [] ؛auxqueue: nmbr [] ؛knstrktr () {this.mainqueue = [] ؛this.auxqueue = [] ؛} psh (wylyw: nmbr) {// tamam anasar ko mynkyw sy aakskyw main mntkl karain jabky (this.mainqueue.length> 0) {this.auxqueue.push (this.mainqueue.shift ()!) ؛} // niay ansar ko mainqueue main shaml kryn۔// tamam anasar ko Auxqueue sy mainqueue par waps mntkl karain jabky (this.auxqueue.length> 0) {this.mainqueue.push (this.auxqueue.shift ()!) ؛}} pap (): nmbr |ghyr wzuahaty {as ko waps kryn۔} jhanknay (): nmbr |ghyr wzuahaty {as ko waps kryn۔} isempty (): bwlyn {waps kryn۔} saiza (): nmbr {as ko waps kryn۔}} // msaal kay tawr par astamal: kanst astyk = nya astyk () astyk.psh (1) ؛ astyk.psh (2) ؛ astyk.psh (3) ؛ knswl.lwgh (astyk.pp ()) ؛// aaؤt pt: 3console.log (stack.peek ()) ؛// aaؤt pt: 2console.log (stack.isempty ()) ؛// aaؤt pt: falseconsole.log (stack.size ()) ؛// aaؤt pt: 2 main is msaal kay tawr par ، hamary pas ayk astyk klas hay jo astyk aapryshnza ki tklyd kay liye do ktaaryn (myn kywiw aur aakskyw) astamal krty haay۔ psh tarykha astyk main ayk ansar ko shaml krta haay۔yha sab sy pehlay tamam anasar ko myn kyw sy aakskyw ki taraf la jata hay ، phir niay ansar ko myn kywi main shaml krta hay ، aur aakhr kar tamam anasar ko aakskyw sy myn kywi ki taraf la jata haay۔as sy yeh ykyny bnta hay keh nya ansar hamyshha ktaar kay samnay waly hasaay main shaml kya jata hay ، js sy astyk kay tarza aml ki nkaly hawty haay۔ pap ka tarykha kar myn kywi kay pap tarykha ka astamal krkay astyk sy upar ansar ko hatata hay aur waps krta haay۔ jhanknay ka tarykha upar lwtata haay۔astyk ka ansar myn kywi kay aakhry ansar tak rsaiy haasal krkay isy hataiay bghyr۔ aai ays ay ty aym py tarykha chyk krta hay keh agar astyk myn kywi ki lmbaiy ki janch kar kay khaly haay۔mainqueue.in msaal kay astamal kay hasaay main ، hum astyk klas ki ayk msaal tyar karty hain ، tyn anasar ko astyk par dhkyl dytay hain ، aur pap ، jhanknay ، aaisympty aur saiza ko kal krkay astyk ki karrwaiywn ka mzaaharha karty hayn۔ntaij knswl par chhapay gaye hayn۔

Question: mshyn lrnngh main dayta pry prwsysngh aur safaiy kay aml ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ykyna!kdanay kay alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey addy ki ayk saf main zayada sy zayada sbryay ka mjmwaha tlash karnay kay liye taip askrpt main ayk msaal prwghram haay: taip askrpt kwpy kwdafkshn myksbrsm (aay aar aar: nmbr []): nmbr {aaiyay myksm = aar aar [0] ؛aaiyay kryntsm = aar aar [0] ؛kay liye (aaiyay i = 1 ؛ i <arr.length ؛ i ++) {kryntsm = math.max (arr [i] ، kryntsm+arr [i]) ؛myksm = ryazuy۔ myks (myksm ، kryntsm) ؛max myksm wapsy} // msaal kay tawr par astamal: kanst srny = [-2 ، 1 ، -3 ، 4 ، -1 ، 2 ، 1 ، -5 ، 4] ؛ kanst myksm = myksbrsm (srny) ؛ knswl.lagh (myksm (myksm)) ؛// aaؤt pt: 6 un msaal kay tawr par ، myksbrarsm fnkshn un pt kay tawr par add ki ayk saf lyta hay aur zayada sy zayada sbry ka mjmwaha waps krta haay۔fnkshn zayada sy zayada rkm ko mwsar andaza main tlash karnay kay liye kdaanay kay alghwrthm ka astamal krta haay۔ alghwrthm do mtghyrat ki abtda krta haay: myksm aur krynsm ، dono saf kay pehlay ansar par syt karty hayn۔as kay bad yeh dusray ansar sy shrwa hony wali saf kay zaryaay tkrar krta haay۔ hr ansar kay l it ، yeh niay kryntsm ka hasab ktab mwjwdha ansar ki zayada sy zayada ya mwjwdha ansar kay tawr par krta hay js main pchhlay kryntsm main shaml kya jata haay۔yha kdm taay krta hay keh aya nya sbry shrwa karna ya mwjwdha sbry ko jary rkhna faidha mnd haay۔ myksm mtghyr ko ab tak paiay janay waly zayada sy zayada rkm ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye hr tkrar par ap dayt kya jata haay۔ lwp kay akhttam par ، myksm mtghyr main zayada sy zayada sbryir rkm hawty hay ،js kay bad is ko waps krdya gaya haay۔ msaal kay tawr par astamal kay hasaay main ، hum antyjrza kay sath ayk srny srny bnatay hain aur zayada sy zayada sbraay rkm tlash karnay kay liye sray par myksbrsm fnkshn ko kal karty hayn۔ntyjha knswl par chhpa hoa haay۔

Question: sfarshat kay nzaam main madal par mbny aur mymwry par mbny bahamy taawn kay sath fltrngh main kya frk haay؟
Answer: ykyna!yhaan taip askrpt main bainry hayp dayta dahanchay (khasa tawr par ayk kam sy kam hayp) ka ayk msaal aml haay: taip askrpt kwpy kwdaklas bainry hayp {hayp: nmbr [] ؛knstrktr () {this.heap = [] ؛} getleftChildIndex (pyrnt andayks: nmbr): nmbr {wapsy 2 * pyrnt andayks + 1 ؛} getRightChildIndex (pyrnt andayks: nmbr): nmbr {wapsy 2 * pyrnt andayks + 2 ؛} getParentIndex (ChildIndex: nmbr): nmbr {rytrn myth.flwr ((chailda andayks - 1) / 2) ؛} haaslfailda (andayks: nmbr): bwlyn {waps kryn۔} haas raitchailda (andayks: nmbr): bwlyn {as ko waps kryn۔ ghyt raitchlda andayks (andayks) <this.heap.length ؛} haaspynt (andayks: nmbr): bwlyn {as ko waps kryn۔ ghyt pyrynt andayks (andayks)> = 0 ؛} baien bchay (andayks: nmbr): nmbr {as ko waps kryn۔} raitaida (andayks: nmbr): nmbr {as ko waps kryn۔} waldyn (andayks: nmbr): nmbr {as ko waps kryn۔} tbadlha (andayks 1: nmbr ، andayks 2: nmbr): batal {const temp = this.heap [index1] ؛this.heap [index1] = this.heap [index2] ؛this.heap [index2] = aarzuy ؛} jhanknay (): nmbr |ghyr wzuahaty {aghr (this.heap.length === 0) {ghyr wazuha shuda waps ؛this is ko waps kryn۔ hayp [0] ؛} pwl (): nmbr |ghyr wzuahaty {aghr (this.heap.length === 0) {ghyr wazuha shuda waps ؛} const aaitm = this.heap [0] ؛this.heap [0] = this.heap [this.heap.length - 1] ؛this.heap.pop () ؛this.heapifydown () ؛aaitm waps ؛} shaml karain (aaitm: nmbr): batal {this.heap.push (aaitm) ؛this.heapifyup () ؛} haypyf ap (): batal {aaiyay andayks = this.heap.length - 1 ؛jbkha (this.hasparent (index) && this.parent (index)> this.heap [index]) {cont parentindex = this.getParentIndex (andayks) ؛this.swap (pyrnt andayks ، andayks) ؛andayks = pyrnt andayks ؛}} haypyfai daawn (): batal {aaiyay andayks = 0 ؛jbkha (this.hasleftchild (index)) small smallerchild index = this.getleftchildindex (andayks) ؛aghr (this.hasrightailda (andayks) && this.righticald (index) <this.leftchild (index)) {smallerchild index = this.getRightChildindex (andayks) ؛} if (this.heap [index] <this.heap [smallerchildindex]) {bryk ؛} else {this.swap (andayks ، smallerchildindex) ؛} andayks = chhwtay bchay}}} // msaal kay tawr par astamal: kanst hayp = nya bainry hayp () ؛ hayp.ada (5) ؛ hayp.adada (3) ؛ hayp.ada (8) ؛ hayp.ada (1) ؛ hayp.ada (9)؛ knswl.lagh (hayp.pwl ()) ؛// aaؤt pt: 1console.log (hayp.pwl ()) ؛// aaؤt pt: 3console.log (hayp.pyk ()) ؛// aaؤt pt: 5 is msaal kay tawr par ، hamary pas bainry hayp klas hay jo bainry hayp dayta dahanchay ki nmaindghy krta haay۔as nfaza main khasa tawr par ayk kam sy kam ansar par twjha di jati hay ، jahan kam sy kam ansar hamyshha jra main hawta haay۔ klas main baien bchay ، dien bchay ، waldyn aur dahyr main anasar kay asharay tak rsaiy haasal karnay kay tarykay shaml hayn۔yha dahyr (ADD) main anasar shaml karnay ، jra ansar (pwl) ko bazayaft aur hatanay ، aur jra ansar par jhanknay kay liye bhi tarykay mhaya krta haay۔

Question: kdrty zaban prwsysngh kay kamwn main wrda 2 wy ay sy aymbydanghza aur un kay astamal kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ykyna!ksy dyiay gaye tar main sab sy tawyl pylndarwmk strngh tlash karnay kay liye taip askrpt main ayk msaal ka prwghram haay: taip askrpt kwpy kwdafkshn tawyl arsaay sy palndrwwmksbstrngh (ays: strngh): strngh {aaiyay shrwa karain = 0 ؛aaiyay zayada sy zayada = 0 ؛// ayk syntr kanstrynda syntr = (baiyn: nmbr ، daiyn: nmbr) kay ard ghrd phylanay kay liye haylpr fnkshn: batal => {jbkha (baiyn> = 0 && dien <s.length && s [baiyn] === s [daiyn]) {Const mwjwdha lmbaiy = dien - baien + 1 ؛aghr (mwjwdha lmbaiy> zayada sy zayada lmbaiy) {astart = baien ؛maxlength = mwjwdha lmbaiy ؛} baiyn--؛hak ++ ؛}} ؛kay liye (aaiyay i = 0 ؛ i <s.length ؛ i ++) {twsyay saؤnda syntr (i ، i) ؛// ajyb lmbaiy pylndarwwm wsat ka mrkza (i ، i + 1) ؛// yahan tak keh lmbaiy ki lmbaiy palindrome} wapsy s.substring (shrwa karain ، start + maxlength) ؛} // msaal kay tawr par astamal: kanst un pt = "babada" ؛ kanstnt tawyl trynpal andarwwm = tawyl trynpal andarwwmkswbstrngh (an pt) ؛ knswl.lagh (tawyl trien palndrwwm) ؛// aaؤt pt: "bab" is msaal main ، sab sy tawyl palaindarwmksbstrngh fnkshn un pt kay tawr par ayk tar lyta hay aur ays kay andr sab sy tawyl pylndarwmk astrngh lwtata haay۔ fnkshn pylndarmk sbstrnghza ko tlash karnay kay liye kesi mrkza kay ghrd phylnay kay tsawr ko astamal krta haay۔yha tar main hr krdar kay zaryaay tkrar krta hay aur isy kesi mmknha pylndarwwm ka mrkza smjhta haay۔as kay bad yeh mrkza sy bahar ki taraf phylta hay keh aya yeh chyk karnay kay liye keh aya dono ataraf kay krdar brabr hayn۔yha mstkl tawr par janch pratal krta hay keh aya baien aur dien harf brabr hain aur wndaw ko is wkt tak phylatay hain jab tak keh harwf ab brabr nah hon ya tar khtm nah hawn۔lmbaiy pylndarwwm (dw harwf kay darmiyan mrkza)۔as main tamam mmknha pylndarwmk sbstrnghza ka ahaataha kya gaya haay۔ lwp kay bad ، fnkshn astart andayks sy myks lmbaiy ki lmbaiy kay sath strngh lwtata hay ، jo un pt strngh main paiay janay waly sab sy tawyl pylndarwmk astrngh ki nmaindghy krta haay۔ msaal kay tawr par astamal kay hasaay main ، hum ayk nmwnha un pt strngh fraham karty hayn۔an pt aur is par tawyl trien palndwmksbstrngh fnkshn ko kal kryn۔ntyjha ، sab sy tawyl pylndarwmk astrngh ، knswl par chhapta haay۔

Question: trtyb ki pysh ghwiy kay liye ayk tawyl klyl mdty mymwry (LSTM) nyt wrk ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ykyna!taip askrpt main ghraf ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye mlhakha mytrks ka ayk msaal aml haay: taip askrpt kwpy kwdaklas ghraf {mlhakha mytrks: nmbr [] [] ؛knstrktr (nmbr: nmbr) {this.adjacencymatrix = [] ؛kay liye (i = 0 ؛ i <numvertices ؛ i ++) {this.adjacencymatrix [i] = [] ؛kay liye (j = 0 ؛ j <numvertices ؛ j ++) {this.adjacencymatrix [i] [j] = 0 ؛}}} aydajda (makhza: nmbr ، mnzal: nmbr): batal {this.adjacencymatrix [makhza] [mnzal] = 1 ؛this.adjacencymatrix [mnzal] [makhza] = 1 ؛} rymjj (makhza: nmbr ، mnzal: nmbr): batal {this.adjacencymatrix [makhza] [mnzal] = 0 ؛this.adjacencymatrix [mnzal] [makhza] = 0 ؛} prnt ghraf (): batal {kay liye (i = 0 ؛ i <this.adjacencymatrix.length ؛ i ++) {const row = this.adjacencymatrix [i] ؛knswl.lagh (ktaar.jwin ('')) ؛}}} // msaal kay tawr par astamal: kanst ghraf = nya ghraf (5) ؛ ghraf.dayj (0 ، 1) ؛ ghraf.dayj (0 ، 4) ؛ ghraf.dayj (1 ، 2) ؛ ghraf.dayj (1 ، 1 ،3) ؛ ghraf.dayj (1 ، 4) ghraf.dayj (2 ، 3) ؛ ghraf.adayj (3 ، 4) ؛ ghraf.pnt ghraf () ؛ is msaal main ، ghraf klas mlhakha mytrks ka astamal karty hoey ghraf ki nmaindghy krta haay. knstrktr un pt kay tawr par amwdy ki tadad lyta hay aur tamam akdar kay sath ayk khaly mlhak mytrks ko shrwa krta haay۔mlhakha mytrks main mtalkha andrajat ko 0. par trtyb dy kar do amwdy kay darmiyan ghair mstkym knaray ghraf ki mlhakha mytrks ki nmaindghy ko knswl par prnt krta haay۔as kay bad hum aydaj kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey mtadd knarwn ko shaml karty hain aur prnt ghraf kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey mlhakha mytrks prnt karty hayn۔ntyjay main mlhakha mytrks knswl daat nwt main zaahar hawta haay: mzakwrha bala aml draamd ayk ghair hadayt shuda ghraf frzu krta hay ، jahan knaray do tarfha hayn۔aghr aap ko hadayt shuda ghraf ki nmaindghy karnay ki zurwrt hay tou ، aap hr hadayt waly knaray kay liye mlhakha mytrks main sirf ayk andraj taay karnay kay liye aydaj aur hatanay kay tarykwn main trmym krsktay hayn۔

Question: aasaaby nyt wrk ki trbyt main jld rknay ka mksad kya hay aur yeh kesay kam krta haay؟
Answer: ykyna!ayk drkht par ghharaiy sy pehlay tlash (DFS) anjam denay kay liye taip askrpt main ayk msaal prwghram haay: taip askrpt kwpy kwdaklas trynwda {kdr: nmbr ؛bchay: trynwda [] ؛knstrktr (kdr: nmbr) {this.value = value ؛this.children = [] ؛} aydachaida (bchha: trynwda): batal {this.children.push (bchha) ؛}} fnkshn day ayf ays (nwda: trynwda): batal {knswl.lwgh (nwda.walyw) ؛kay liye (nwda. bchwn ka bch child ha) {DFS (bchha) ؛}} // msaal kay tawr par astamal: kanst rwt = nya trynwda (1) const kntda chlda 1 = nya trynwda (2) ؛ kanst chlda 2 = nya trynwda (3) ؛ knst pwtay 1 = nya trynwda (4) ؛ knst pwtay 2 = nya trynwda (5) ؛ rwt.adaaidaaida (chailda 1) ؛ rwt.adadaaida (chailda 2) ؛ chailda 1۔daydachailda (pwtay 1) ؛ chailda 2۔adadachailda (pwtay 2) ؛ day ayf ays (rwt) ؛ is msaal main ، hamary pas drkht main nwda ki nmaindghy karnay wala ayk trynwda klas haay۔har nwda main bchwn ki nwdas ki ayk kdr aur ayk saf hawty haay۔ aydadaaida ka tarykha bchwn ko bchwn ki saf main dhkyl kar bchwn kay nwdas ko shaml karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ day ayf ays fnkshn drkht par ghharaiy ki pehli tlash krta haay۔yha un pt kay tawr par ayk nwda lyta hay aur mwjwdha nwda ki kymt prnt krkay shrwa hawta haay۔as kay bad ، yeh mwjwdha nwda kay hr bchay par day ayf ays ko bar bar kal krta hay ، js sy drkht ko mؤsar tarykay sy ghharaiy sy pehlay ki tlash hawty haay۔ msaal kay tawr par astamal kay hasaay main ، hum trynwda ki msaal bna kar aur aydadachda kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey un ko jwra kar drkht ka dahanchha bnatay hayn۔as kay bad hum ghharaiy sy pehlay tlash karnay kay liye rwt nwda par day ayf ays ko kal karty hayn۔nwdas ki akdar knswl par chhapay jatay hain ، jo drkht ki ghharaiy sy pehlay trawrsl ka mzaaharha karty hayn۔ nwt: yeh msaal drkhtwn ki ayk aam dahanchha frzu krty hay jahan hr nwda main bohat sy bchay hawsktay hayn۔aghr aap kay pas drkhtwn ka mkhsawsa dahanchha hay tou ، aap trynwda klas aur is kay mtaabk msaal kay astamal main trmym krsktay hayn۔

Question: ty sn (ty tksym shuda astakstk prawsy aymbydangh) kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur tawl wa arzu main kami main is kay astamal۔
Answer: ykyna!taip askrpt main raha kay kmpryshn kay sath ayk naghwar syt dayta dahanchay (jsay ywnyn-fnda dayta dahanchha bhi kaha jata haay) ka ayk msaal aml haay: taip askrpt kwpy kwdaklas daswait syt {waldyn: nmbr [] ؛drjha: nmbr [] ؛knstrktr (saiza: nmbr) {this.palent = [] ؛this.rank = [] ؛kay liye (aaiyay i = 0 ؛ i <saiza ؛ i ++) {this.peart [i] = i ؛this.rank [i] = 0 ؛}} tlash karain (x: nmbr): nmbr {if (this.palent [x]! == x) {this.palent [x] = this.find (this.palent [x]) ؛// rastha kmpryshn} is ko waps kryn۔ pyrnt [x] ؛} ywnyn (x: nmbr ، Y: nmbr): batal {const rootx = this.find (x) ؛kanst rwt = this.find (y) ؛aghr (rwt ayks! == rwt) {aghr (this.rank [rwt ayks] <this.rank [rwt]) {this.palent [rwt ayks] = rwt ؛} dusri sawrt main agar (this.rank [rwt ayks]> yha۔ rynk [rwt]) {this.peart [rwt] = rwt ayks ؛} else {this.pearnt [rwt] = rwt ayks ؛this.rank [rootx] ++ ؛}}}} // msaal kay tawr par astamal: kwnst day ays = nya dasywint syt (5) ؛ day ays ywn (0 ، 2) ؛ day ays ywn (4 ، 2) ؛ day ays (3 ، 1) ؛ knswl.lwgh (day ays (day ays.find (4) === ds.find (0)) ؛// aaؤt pt: trueconsole.log (ds.find (1) === ds.find (2)) ؛// aaؤt pt: is msaal kay tawr par ، naghwar tabkay ki klas raha kmpryshn kay sath ayk naghwar syt dayta dahanchay ki nmaindghy krty haay۔ knstrktr naghwar syt ka abtdaiy saiza lyta hay aur waldyn ki saf aur drjha bndy ki saf ko shrwa krta haay۔waldyn ki saf main hr ansar mtalkha ansar kay waldyn ki nmaindghy krta hay ، aur rynk srny hr ansar kay drjha (ya awnchaiy) ko astwr krta haay۔ tlash karnay ka tarykha is napsndydha syt ki jra tlash krta hay js sy ayks ka talk haay۔yha hr mlahazaha karnay waly ansar kay waldyn ko jra sy bar bar ap dayt krkay raha kmpryshn ka astamal krta hay ، jo drkht ko chpta karnay aur mstkbl ki tlash ko bhatr bnanay main mdd krta haay۔ ywnyn ka tarykha do mtnazaaha sytwn ka athaad anjam dyta hay js main anasar X aur Y par mushtamil hawta haay۔as ko pehlay tlash kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey sytwn ki jrayn mil jati hayn۔aghr jrayn mkhtlf hain tou ، yeh un ki safwn ka mwazanha krta hay aur jra ko nchlay drjay kay sath dusri jra kay waldyn bnata haay۔aghr drjat brabr hain tou ، yeh mn many tawr par waldyn ki haysayt sy ayk jra ka antkhab krta hay aur is kay drjha main azuafha hawta haay۔ msaal kay tawr par astamal kay hasaay main ، hum 5 kay saiza kay sath das dayspyt klas ki ayk msaal tyar karty hayn۔chyk karain keh aya kuch anasar tlash kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey ayk hi syt sy talk rkhtay hayn۔ntaij knswl par chhapay jatay hain ، jo rastay kay kmpryshn kay sath napsndydha syt dayta dahanchay ki faalyt ka mzaaharha karty hayn۔

Question: drjha bndy kay liye bay trtyb jnghl kay jwra ko trbyt denay main shaml aham akdamat ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ykyna!taip askrpt main ayk msaal prwghram yeh hay keh aya yeh chyk karnay kay liye keh aya koi ghraf baipartait haay: taip askrpt kwpy kwdaynm rngh {ghyr rnghyn = 0 ، srkh = 1 ، blyw = 2 ،} fnkshn aais bpartait (ghraf: nmbr [] []): bwlyn {kanst ayn = ghraf. lmbaiy ؛rnghyn rngh: rngh [] = srny (ayn)kanst day ayf ays = (nwda: nmbr ، rngh: rngh): bwlyn => {rngh [nwda] = rngh ؛kay liye (ghraf kay prawsy [nwda]) {aghr (rngh [prawsy] === rngh) {ghlta lwtyn ؛// ayk hi rngh kay sath mlhakha nwdas paiay gaye ، baipartait nhayn} if (rngh [prawsy] === rnghyn۔// tkrar wali kal ghalat lwt hogi ، baipartait nhayn}} sch waps ؛} ؛kay liye (aaiyay i = 0 ؛ i <n ؛ i ++) {aghr (rngh [i] === color.uncolored &&! dfs (i ، color.red)) {ghlta waps ؛// ayk mnslk jzaw mila jo do tarfha nahin haay}} sch waps ؛// tamam mnslk ajzaaa baipartait hayn} // msaal kay tawr par astamal: kanst ghraf 1 = [[1 ، 3] ، [0 ، 2] ، [1 ، 3] ، [0 ، 2]] ؛// baipartait ghrafknswl.lwgh (isbipartite (ghraf 1)) ؛// aaؤt pt: trueconst ghraf 2 = [[1 ، 2 ، 3] ، [0 ، 2] ، [1 ، 3] ، [0 ، 2]] ؛// nahin baipartait ghrafknswl.lwgh (isbipartite (ghraf 2)) ؛// aaؤt pt: is msaal kay tawr par ، isbipartite fnkshn ayk ghraf lyta hay js ki nmaindghy mlhakha fharst (ghraf) ki haysayt sy hawty hay aur agar ghraf do tarfha aur ghalat hay tou sahayha lwtta haay۔dw rnghwn sy rnghyn rahain jesay kesi mlhakha nwdas ka rngh ayk hi nahin hawta haay۔ rnghyn aynwm nwdas kay liye tyn mmknha rnghwn ki wzuahat krta haay: ghair rnghyn ، srkh aur nylay rngh۔ghyr rnghyn rngh is bat ki nshandhay krta hay keh abhi tak nwda ka rngh nahin hoa haay۔ day ayf ays mddghar fnkshn ghharaiy ki pehli tlash krta haay۔yha un pt kay tawr par ayk nwda aur rngh lyta haay۔yha mwjwdha nwda ko mkhsawsa rngh kay sath rngh dyta hay aur apnay prawsywn par day ayf ays ko bar bar kal krta hay ، is bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh woh mkhalf rngh (3 - rngh) kay sath rnghyn hayn۔aghr is ka samna kesi prawsy sy hawta hay jo pehlay hi ayk hi rngh kay sath rnghyn hochuka hay tou ، yeh ghalat lwtta hay ، js sy yeh zaahar hawta hay keh ghraf do tarfha nahin haay۔aghr ayk bar bar chlnay wali kal ghalat lwtty hay tou ، fnkshn bhi ghalat lwtata haay۔ is baipartait fnkshn ki aham mntak ghraf main hr nwda kay zaryaay tkrar krty haay۔aghr abhi tak nwda ka rngh nahin hoa hay (rnghyn۔aghr day ayf ays kay doran koi mnslk jzaw do tarfha nahin paya jata hay tou ، fnkshn ghalat lwtta haay۔bsawrt dyghr ، agar tamam mnslk ajzaaa kamyaby kay sath rnghyn hain aur koi tnazaaat nahin paiay jatay hain tou ، fnkshn sch ko waps krta haay۔ msaal kay tawr par astamal kay hasaay main ، hum do msaal ghraf (ghraf 1 aur ghraf 2) fraham karty hayn۔ham hr ghraf par isbipartite fnkshn kehty hain aur ntaij ko knswl par prnt karty hain ، mkhtlf ghrafwn kay liye do tarfha chyk ka mzaaharha karty hayn۔

Question: lkyry rjat psnd madalza main L1 aur L2 ko bakaadha bnanay main kya frk haay؟
Answer: ykyna!taip askrpt main ayk sy zayada haysh afaal kay sath blwm fltr dayta dahanchay ka ayk msaal aml haay: taip askrpt kwpy kwdaklas blwm fltr {btyray: bwlyn [] ؛numhashfunctions: nmbr ؛knstrktr (saiza: nmbr ، nmbr haashfkshn: nmbr) {this.bitarray = nya srny (saiza). fl (ghlta) ؛this.numhashfunctions = numhashfunctions ؛} shaml karain (ansar: strngh): batal {kanst haysh = this.gethashes (ansar) ؛kay liye (haysh ka haysh) {this.bitarray [haysh] = sch ؛}} par mushtamil hay (ansar: strngh): bwlyn {kanst haysh = this.gethashes (ansar) ؛kay liye (haysh ka haysh) {aghr (! this.bitarray [haysh]) {jhwty lwt ؛}} sch waps ؛} njy ghytshys (ansar: strngh): nmbr [] {kanst haysh: nmbr [] = [] ؛kay liye (aaiyay i = 1 ؛ i <= this.numhashfunctions ؛ i ++) {const hash = this.hash (ansar ، i) ؛haysh۔ psh (haysh) ؛} hayshwn ki wapsy ؛} njy haysh (ansar: strngh ، byj: nmbr): nmbr {aaiyay haysh = 0 ؛kay liye (aaiyay i = 0 ؛ i <ansary. lmbaiy ؛ i ++) {haysh = (haysh * byj+ansar۔ charcodeat (i)) ٪ this.bitarray.length ؛} haysh ki wapsy ؛}} // msaal kay tawr par astamal: kanst fltr = nya blwm fltr (100 ، 3) ؛ fltr.ada ('aypl') ؛ fltr.ada ('kylay') ؛ fltr.adada ('chyry') ؛ knswl.lwgh (fltr (fltr.kwntynza ('aypl')) ؛// aaؤt pt: trueconsole.log (fltr.kwntynza ('kylay')) ؛// aaؤt pt: trueconsole.log (fltr.kwntynza ('chyry')) ؛// aaؤt pt: trueconsole.log (fltr.kwntynza ('anghwr')) ؛// aaؤt pt: is msaal kay tawr par ، blwm fltr klas ayk sy zayada haysh fnkshnza kay sath blwm fltr dayta dahanchay ki nmaindghy krta haay۔ knstrktr do pyramytrza lyta haay: saiza (bt srny ka saiza) aur nmbrshfkshn (astamal karnay kay liye haysh afaal ki tadad).shaml karnay ka tarykha blwm fltr main ansar shaml krta haay۔yha ghytshys kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey ansar kay liye mtadd hayshwn ka hasab lghata hay aur bt srny main mtalkha pwzayshnwn ko sch par syt krta haay۔ agar koi ansar blwm fltr main mwjwd hay tou is ka tarykha chyk krta haay۔yha jythashs kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey ansar kay liye hayshwn ka hasab lghata hay aur chyk krta hay keh kya bt srny main tamam mtalkha pwzayshnyn drst hayn۔aghr koi pwzayshn ghalat hay tou ، yeh ghalat lwtty haay۔bsawrt dyghr ، yeh sch lwtta haay۔ ghytshys ka tarykha mkhtlf byjwn ki akdar kay liye haysh kay tarykha kar ko talb krkay kesi ansar kay liye mtadd hayshwn ka hasab lghata haay۔ haysh ka tarykha mkhsawsa byj ka astamal karty hoey kesi ansar kay liye haysh ki kymt ka hasab lghata haay۔yha ansar kay hr krdar kay zaryaay tkrar krta hay ، ayk sadha hayshngh alghwrthm (zurb aur madaywlw) anjam dyta hay ، aur is kay ntyjay main haysh wylyw ko lwtata haay۔ msaal kay tawr par astamal kay hasaay main ، hum blwm fltr klas ki ayk msaal bnatay hain js main 100 aur 3 kay thwraa sa srny saiza hawta haay۔haysh kay afaal.ham ADD kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey fltr main tyn anasar shaml karty hain aur phir chyk karain keh aya is main shaml tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey fltr main kiy anasar mwjwd hain ya nhayn۔blwm fltr ki faalyt ka mzaaharha karty hoey ntaij knswl par chhapay jatay hayn۔

Question: aasaaby nyt wrks main twjha kay tarykha kar kay tsawr aur trtyb sy trtyb kay kamwn main un kay astamal ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ykyna!hadayt shuda aysaiklk ghraf (day aay jy) par twpwlwjykl trtyb denay kay liye taip askrpt main ayk msaal prwghram haay: taip askrpt kwpy kwdaklas ghraf {mlhakha lst: nkshha <nmbr ، nmbr []> ؛knstrktr () {this.adjacencyList = nya nkshha <nmbr ، nmbr []> () ؛} aydawrtyks (wrtyks: nmbr): batal {if (! this.adjacencylist.has (vertex)) {this.adjacencylist.set (vertex ، []) ؛}} aydaj (say: nmbr ، say: nmbr): batal {aghr (! this.adjacencylist.has (mnjanb) ||ghraf. ') ؛} knst prawsy = this.adjacencyList.get (mnjanb) ؛prawsy۔ psh (say) ؛} twpwlwjstswrt (): nmbr [] {knstt mlahazaha kryn: syt <nmbr> = nya syt <nmbr> () ؛kanst astyk: nmbr [] = [] ؛kanst day ayf ays = (wrtyks: nmbr): batal => {mlahazaha kya ghya۔ ayda (wrtyks) ؛knst prawsy = this.adjacencyList.get (wrtyks) ؛aghr (prawsy) {kay liye (prawsywn kay prawsy) {aghr (! mlahazaha kya ghya۔ (prawsy)) {day ayf ays (prawsy) ؛}}} astyk.psh (wrtyks) ؛} ؛kay liye (as ki kanstryks۔ adjacencylist.keys ()) {aghr (! mlahazaha kya ghya۔ haas (wrtyks)) {DFS (wrtyks) ؛}} rytrn astyk۔ rywrs () ؛}} // msaal kay tawr par astamal: kanst ghraf = nya ghraf () ؛ ghraf.adawrtyks (1) ؛ ghraf.adawrtyks (2) ؛ ghraf.adawrtyks (3) ؛ ghraf.adawrtyks (4) ؛ ghraf.adawrtyks (5) ؛ghraf.adawrtyks (6) ؛ ghraf.dayj (1 ، 2) ؛ ghraf.adayj (1 ، 3) ؛ ghraf.dayj (2 ، 3) ؛ ghraf.adayj (2 ، 4) ؛ ghraf.adayj (3 ، 5) ؛ ghraf.adayj (4 ، 6) ؛ ghraf.dayj (5 ، 6) ؛ trtyb trtyb dyn// aaؤt pt: [1 ، 2 ، 4 ، 3 ، 5 ، 6] is msaal main ، ghraf klas hadayt shuda aysaiklk ghraf (day aay jy) ki nmaindghy krta haay۔as main ayk mlhakha fharst hay jo hr ayk ko apnay prawsywn ki fharst main nkshha bnaty haay۔ aydawrtyks ka tarykha kar hamsayha mmalk ki khaly saf kay sath mlhakha fharst main dakhlha bna kar ghraf main ayk wrtyks ko shaml krta haay۔ aydajda ka tarykha ayk wrtyks sy hadayt shuda knaray ko shaml krta hay (say) kesi dusray wrtyks (to) sy la kar prawsywn ki fharst main shaml krkay۔ twpwlwjstswrt ka tarykha twpwlwjykl trtyb dyta haay۔yha ghraf ko dryaft karnay kay liye ghharaiy main pehli tlash (DFS) nktaha nzar ka astamal krta hay aur un kay aakhry awkat kay alt trtyb main astyk main amwdy ko shaml krta haay۔ayk amwdy wkt kay aakhry wkt ki wzuahat is wkt kay tawr par ki jati hay jab isy apnay tamam prawsywn sy mlnay kay bad astyk par dhkyl diya jata haay۔aakhr main ، yeh twpwlwjykl aardarngh haasal karnay kay liye astyk ko alt trtyb main lwtata haay۔ msaal kay tawr par astamal kay hasaay main ، hum ayk ghraf msaal bnatay hain aur day aay jy ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye amwdy aur knarwn ko shaml karty hayn۔as kay bad hum twpwlwjykl sart tarykha ko twpwlwjykl trtyb denay aur trtyb shuda amwdy ko haasal karnay kay liye kal karty hayn۔trtyb shuda amwdy knswl par chhapay jatay hain ، js main ghraf ki twpwlwjykl ksm ka mzaaharha hawta haay۔

Question: Q- lrnngh ka astamal karty hoey ghhary kmk sykhnay kay ayjnt ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ykyna!taip askrpt main K-D try dayta dahanchay ka ayk msaal aml haay: taip askrpt kwpy kwdaklas trynwda {nktaha: nmbr [] ؛baiyn: trynwda |khaly؛daiyn: trynwda |khaly؛knstrktr (nktaha: nmbr []) {this.Point = nktaha ؛this.left = null ؛this.right = null ؛}} klas kdtree {jra: Treenode |khaly؛tawl wa arzu: nmbr ؛knstrktr (tawl wa arzu: nmbr) {this.root = null ؛this.dimensions = tawl wa arzu ؛} dakhl karain (nktaha: nmbr []): batal {this.root = this.insertnode (this.root ، nktaha ، 0) ؛} njy Insertnode (nwda: trynwda | null ، nktaha: nmbr [] ، ghharaiy: nmbr): trynwda {aghr (nwda ==== null) {waps nya trynwda (nktaha) waps karain ؛const kntyn krnt daymynshn = ghharaiy ٪ as۔aghr (nktaha [mwjwdha tdwyn] <nwda.pwaint [krnt daymynshn]) {node.left = this.insertnode (node.left ، nktaha ، ghharaiy + 1) ؛} else {node.right = this.insertnode (node.right ، nktaha ، ghharaiy + 1) ؛} wapsy nwda ؛} tlash (nktaha: nmbr []): bwlyn {as ko waps kryn۔ srchnwda (yha.rwt ، pwaint ، 0) ؛} njy srch nwda (nwda: trynwda | NULL ، nktaha: nmbr [] ، ghharaiy: nmbr): bwlyn {aghr (nwda ==== null) {ghlta waps ؛} if (this.arepointseal (node.Point ، nktaha)) {sch waps ؛const kntyn krnt daymynshn = ghharaiy ٪ as۔aghr (nktaha [mwjwdha jhat] <nwda.pwaint [krnt daymynshn]) this is ko waps lwtaiyn۔} else {as ki srch nwda (nwda.rait ، pwaint ، ghharaiy + 1) waps karain ؛priective} praiywyt sykwil (pwaint 1: nmbr [] ، pwaint 2: nmbr []): bwlyn {kay liye (i = 0 ؛ i <this.dimensions ؛ i ++) {aghr (pwaint 1 [i]!
