== pwaint 2 [i]){jhwta lwt ؛}} sch waps ؛}} // msaal kay tawr par astamal: kanst kdtree = new kdtree (2) ؛ kdtree.insert ([3 ، 6]) ؛ kdtree.insert ([17 ، 15]) ؛ kdtree.insert ([13 ، 15]) ؛ kdtree.INSERT ([6 ، 12]) ؛ kdtree.insert ([9 ، 1]) ؛ kdtree.insert ([2 ، 7]) ؛ knswl.lwgh (kdtree.search ([6 ، 12]) ؛// aaؤt pt: trueconsole.log (kdtree.search ([13 ، 15])) ؛// aaؤt pt: trueconsole.log (kdtree.search ([10 ، 10])) ؛// aaؤt pt: is msaal kay tawr par ، trynwda klas K-D drkht main nwda ki nmaindghy krty haay۔har nwda main tawl wa arzu ki lmbaiy ، ayk baien bchay aur dien bchay ka ayk nktaha hawta haay۔ Kdtree klas K-D drkht kay aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay ki nmaindghy krty haay۔as main jra ka nwda hay aur drkht main tawl wa arzu ki tadad haay۔ dakhl karnay ka tarykha INSERTNODE kay tarykha kar ko kal krkay K-D kay drkht main ayk nya nktaha dakhl krta haay۔INSERTNODE ka tarykha drkht ko bar bar abwr krta hay ، mwjwdha jhat ki akdar ka mwazanha krta hay takha is bat ka tayn kya jaskay keh aya baien ya dien sab try main nktaha dakhl karna hay ya nhayn۔ghharaiy ka astamal drkht ki hr staha par mwjwdha jhat ka tayn karnay kay liye kya jata haay۔ tlash ka tarykha kar srchnwda kay tarykha kar ko kal krkay K-D drkht main dyiay gaye nktaha ki tlash krta haay۔srchnwda ka tarykha drkht ko bar bar abwr krta hay ، baien ya dien sab try par tshryf la janay kay liye mwjwdha jhat ki akdar ka mwazanha krta haay۔aghr nktaha paya jata hay tou ، yeh sch waps aajata haay۔wrnha ،

Question: aasaaby nyt wrks main bych ko mamwl par lanay ka mksad kya hay aur yeh kesay kam krta haay؟
Answer: ykyna!bainry drkht main do nwdas kay sab sy kam aam ajdad ko tlash karnay kay liye taip askrpt main ayk msaal prwghram haay: taip askrpt kwpy kwdaklas trynwda {kdr: nmbr ؛baiyn: trynwda |khaly؛daiyn: trynwda |khaly؛knstrktr (kdr: nmbr) {this.value = value ؛this.left = null ؛this.right = null ؛}} fnkshn sab sy kam kamwnansystr (jra: trynwda | nwl ، py: trynwda ، Q: trynwda): trynwda |null {if (jra === null || jra === p || jra === Q) {rwt rwt ؛} kanst baien = sab sy kam kamwnansystr (rwt. lyft ، py ، kyw) ؛kwnt rait = kam trien kamwnansystr (jra۔ rait ، py ، kyw) ؛aghr (baiyn! == null && daiyn! == null) {rwt rwt ؛left baien taraf lwt! == null؟baiyn: dien ؛} // msaal kay tawr par astamal: kanst rwt = nya trynwda (3) ؛ rwt. lyft = nya trynwda (5) ؛ rwt. rait = nya trynwda (1) ؛ rwt.lft.lft = nya trynwda (6)؛ rwt. lyft۔ rait = nya trynwda (2) ؛ rwt۔ rait.lyft = nya trynwda (0) ؛ rwt. rait. rait = nya trynwda (8) ؛ rwt.lft.rait.lyft = nya trynwda (7)؛ root.left.right.right = new Treenode (4) ؛ const p = root.left ؛// kymt kay sath nwda// kymt kay sath nwda// aaؤt pt: 5 is msaal kay tawr par ، trynwda klas bainry drkht main nwda ki nmaindghy krty haay۔har nwda main is kay baien aur dien bchwn ki kdr aur hawalha hawta haay۔ sab sy kam kamkwmnanstr fnkshn tyn pyramytrza lyta haay: bainry try ki jra aur do nwdas py aur kyw js kay liye hum sab sy kam aam aabaؤ ajdad tlash karna chahti hayn۔yha bainry kay drkht ko abwr karnay kay liye ayk bar bar nktaha nzar astamal krta haay۔ hr nwda par ، yeh chyk krta hay keh aya mwjwdha nwda ya tou P ya Q hay ya null haay۔aghr aysa hay tou ، yeh mwjwdha nwda ko sab sy kam aam aabaؤ ajdad kay tawr par lwtata haay۔ghyr nwl akdar ، is ka mtalb yeh hay keh py aur kyw mkhtlf sab trywn main mwjwd hain ، aur mwjwdha nwda sab sy kam aam aabaؤ ajdad haay۔bsawrt dyghr ، yeh nan nwl sab try kay ntaij ya kaladm ko waps krta hay agar dono sab trywn ki msaal kay tawr par astamal kay hasaay main ، hum ayk bainry try bnatay hain aur isy akdar kay sath shrwa karty hayn۔ham drkht kay andr do nwdas kay tawr par py aur kyw ki wzuahat karty hayn۔as kay bad hum un kay sab sy kam aam aabaؤ ajdad ko tlash karnay kay liye jrawn aur do nwdas kay sath sab sy kam kamwnansystr fnkshn kehty hayn۔sb sy kam aam aabaؤ ajdad nwda ki kdr knswl par chhpy hui haay۔

Question: ghair mnkwlha sykhnay kay kamwn main aatw ankwdarza kay tsawr aur un kay astamal ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ykyna!taip askrpt main ayk splyp try dayta dahanchay ka ayk msaal aml haay: taip askrpt kwpy kwdaklas trynwda {klyd: nmbr ؛baiyn: trynwda |khaly؛daiyn: trynwda |khaly؛knstrktr (klyd: nmbr) {this.key = key ؛this.left = null ؛this.right = null ؛}} klas splaytree {jra: Treenode |khaly؛knstrktr () {this.root = null ؛} dakhl karain (klyd: nmbr): batal {aghr (this.root === null) {this.root = nya trynwda (klyd) ؛wapsy ؛} this.splay (klyd) ؛aghr (klyd <this.root.key) {const newnode = nya trynwda (klyd) ؛newnode.left = this.root.left ؛newnode.right = this.root ؛this.root.left = null ؛this.root = newnode ؛} dusri sawrt main agar (key> this.root.key) {const newnode = new Treenode (key) ؛newnode.right = this.root.right ؛newnode.left = this.root ؛this.root.right = null ؛this.root = newnode ؛}} tlash (klyd: nmbr): bwlyn {this.splay (key) ؛as ko waps kryn!} njy sply (klyd: nmbr): batal {aghr (this.root === null || this.root.key === key) {wapsy ؛} knst damy: trynwda = {klyd: 0 ، baiyn: NULL ، daiyn: null} ؛baiyn taraf janay dyn = damy ؛aaiyay rait myn = damy ؛aaiyay mwjwdha nwda = this.root ؛jbkha (sch haay) {aghr (klyd <mwjwdha nwda.ky) {aghr (mwjwdha nwda.lft ==== null) {bryk ؛} if (key <mwjwdha nwda.lft.ky) {const temp = pertionnode.left ؛mwjwdha nwda.lft = tymp. rait ؛temp.right = mwjwdha nwda ؛mwjwdha nwda = aarzuy ؛aghr (mwjwdha nwda.lft === null) {bryk ؛}} raitrmyn.lft = krnt nwda ؛raitrmyn = krnt nwda ؛mwjwdha nwda = krntnwda.lft ؛} dusri sawrt main agar (key> reverthynode.key) {if (currentnode.right ==== null) {bryk ؛} if (key> reverthynode.right.key) {const temp = retighternode.right ؛mwjwdha nwda۔ rait = temp.left ؛temp.left = mwjwdha nwda ؛mwjwdha nwda = aarzuy ؛aghr (mwjwdha nwda۔ rait === null) {bryk ؛}} baien try myks۔ rait = krnt nwda ؛baiyn try myks = krnt nwda ؛krntnwda = krntnwda. rait ؛} dusri {bryk ؛}} baien try myks. rait = krntnwda.lft ؛raitrmyn.lft = krntnwda. rait ؛mwjwdha nwda. lyft = damy. rait ؛mwjwdha nwda۔ rait = dummy.left ؛this.root = mwjwdha nwda ؛}} // msaal kay tawr par astamal: Const splaytree = new splaytree () spla splaytree.insert (10) ؛ splaytree.insert (5) ؛ splaytree.insert (15) ؛ splaytree.insert (3) ؛ splaytree.insert (8) ؛splaytree.insert (12) ؛ splaytree.insert (17) ؛ knswl.lwgh (splaytree.search (8)) ؛// aaؤt pt: trueconsole.log (splaytree.search (12)) ؛// aaؤt pt: trueconsole.log (splaytree.search (20)) ؛// aaؤt pt: is msaal kay tawr par ، trynwda klas sply kay drkht main ayk nwda ki nmaindghy krty haay۔har nwda main ayk klyd ، is kay baien bchay ka hawalha ، aur is kay dien bchay ka hawalha hawta haay۔ aspltry klas asplt try kay aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay ki nmaindghy krty haay۔as main jra ka nwda haay۔ dakhl karnay ka tarykha splay kay drkht main ayk niy klyd dakhl krta hay

Question: klstrngh kay liye ghawsy mkschr madal (jy aym aym) ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: nyt wrk kay bhaaؤ kay msilay main zayada sy zayada bhaaؤ tlash karnay kay l you ، aap fwrda flkrsn alghwrthm ya is ki ayk mkhtlf haaltwn ، jesay aydamndas-karp alghwrthm ya daaink kay alghwrthm ka astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan taip askrpt main aydamndas karp alghwrthm ka ayk msaal aml haay: taip askrpt kwpy kwdaklas ghraf {njy ghraf: nmbr [] [] ؛knstrktr (ghraf: nmbr [] []) {this.graph = ghraf ؛bified njy by ayf ays (makhza: nmbr ، hadf: nmbr ، waldyn: nmbr []): bwlyn {knstt mlahazaha karain = niy srny (as. ghraf.lnth). fl (ghlta) ؛kanst ktaar: nmbr [] = [] ؛ktaar.psh (makhza) ؛dwrha [makhza] = sch ؛waldyn [makhza] = -1 ؛jbkha (ktaar۔ lmbaiy> 0) {kwnst yw = ktaar۔ shft () !؛kay liye (aaiyay v = 0 ؛ v <this.graph.length ؛ v ++) {aghr (! mlahazaha kya [v] && this.graph [u] [v]> 0) {ktaar.psh (v) ؛dwrha [v] = sch ؛waldyn [v] = u ؛}}} wapsy ka dwrha [hadf] ؛} njy mnkasyty (rastha: nmbr [] ، waldyn: nmbr []): nmbr {aaiyay mnt kypasyty = anfynty ؛aaiyay v = rastha [rastha۔ lmbaiy - 1] ؛jbkha (v! == 0) {const u = waldyn [v] ؛mincapacity = math.min (mincapacity ، this.graph [u] [v]) ؛v = u ؛min mincapacity waps ؛} njy apdaytrsydaywl ghraf (rastha: nmbr [] ، waldyn: nmbr [] ، mnkasyty: nmbr): batal {chlw v = rastha [rastha۔ lmbaiy - 1] ؛jbkha (v! == 0) {const u = waldyn [v] ؛this.graph [u] [v] -= mincapacity ؛this.graph [v] [u] += mincapacity ؛v = u ؛}} pblk myks flw (makhza: nmbr ، hadf: nmbr): nmbr {mstkl waldyn: nmbr [] = nya srny (as.ghraf.lnth) ؛aaiyay zayada sy zayada = 0 ؛jbkha (this.bfs (makhza ، hadf ، waldyn)) {const mincapacity = this.mincapacity ([hadf] ، waldyn) ؛this.updateresidual ghraf ([hadf] ، waldyn ، mincapacity) ؛myks flw += mincapacity ؛} myks flw ki wapsy ؛}} // msaal kay tawr par astamal: kanst ghraf = [[0 ، 16 ، 13 ، 0 ، 0 ، 0] ، [0 ، 0 ، 10 ، 12 ، 0 ، 0] ، [0 ، 4 ، 0 ، 0 ، 14 ، 14 ،0] ، [0 ، 0 ، 9 ، 0 ، 0 ، 20] ، [0 ، 0 ، 0 ، 7 ، 0 ، 4] ، [0 ، 0 ، 0 ، 0 ، 0 ، 0 ، 0] ،] ؛ kans nyt wrk =nya ghraf (ghraf) Const kanstr makhza = 0 Const knt targht = 5 ؛ kanst myks flw = nyt wrk۔ myks flw (makhza ، hadf) ؛ knswl.lwgh ("zayadha sy zayada bhaaؤ:" ، zayada sy zayada flw) ؛ is msaal main ، ghraf klas is ki nmaindghy krta haaynyt wrk flw ghraf۔ghraf praprty ayk do jhaty saf hay jo nwdas kay darmiyan knarwn ki salahaytwn ko mhafwza krty haay۔ by ayf ays ka tarykha kar sy la kar hadf tak brahanay wala rastha tlash karnay kay liye chwraaiy ki pehli tlash krta haay۔aghr is tarah ka rastha mwjwd hay aur mkhtsar trien rastay kay sath waldyn ki safwn ko ap dayt krta hay tou yeh sch waps aata haay۔ mnkasyty ka tarykha kar brahanay waly rastay kay sath kam sy kam salahayt ka tayn krta haay۔ apdaytyrsydaywl ghraf tarykha rastay ko brahanay kay bad bkaya ghraf ki salahaytwn ko ap dayt krta haay۔

Question: drjha bndy kay kamwn main sahat sy mtalk aur drstghy main kya frk haay؟
Answer: ykyna!taip askrpt main mstkl astyk dayta dahanchay ka ayk msaal aml haay: taip askrpt kwpy kwdaklas astyk nwda <T> {kdr: t ؛aghla: astyk nwda <t> |khaly؛knstrktr (wylyw: ty ، aghla: astyk nwda <T> | null) {this.value = value ؛this.next = aghla ؛class} klas mstkl astyk <t> {njy wrzen: {[klyd: nmbr]: astyk nwda <T> |khaly }؛njy tazaha trien tbdyly: nmbr ؛knstrktr () {this.versions = {} ؛this.latestversion = 0 ؛yha۔} psh (wylyw: ty): batal {kwnt krntwrshn = this.latestversion ؛Const mwjwdha hayda = yha۔kwnst nyw hayda = nya astyk nwda (wylyw ، krnt hayda) ؛this.latestversion ++ ؛yha۔} pap (): batal {kwnt krnt wrsn = this.latestversion ؛Const mwjwdha hayda = yha۔aghr (mwjwdha hayda === null) {wapsy ؛} this.latestversion ++ ؛yha۔} tap (): ty |null {const hethead = this.versions [this.latestversion] ؛mwjwdha hayda waps! == kaladm؟mwjwdha hayda. wylyw: null ؛} getVersion (wrzen: nmbr): t [] {CONST ntyjha: t [] = [] ؛mwjwdha hayda = yha۔jbkha (krnt hayda! == null) {ntyjha۔ psh (mwjwdha hayda.Value) ؛mwjwdha hayda = krnt hayda. nykst ؛} wapsy ka ntyjha ؛}} // msaal kay tawr par astamal: kanst astyk = nya mstkl astyk <nmbr> () ؛ astyk.psh (1) ؛ astyk.psh (2) ؛ astyk.psh (3) ؛ kwnst wrzen 1 = astyk۔ lytstwrshn ؛ knswl.lagh (knswl.lagh (stac.getVersion (wrzen 1)) ؛// aaؤt pt: [1 ، 2 ، 3] astyk.pp () ؛ knst wrzen 2 = astyk۔ lytstwrshn ؛ knswl.lwgh (astyk.yt ghytwrsyshn (wrzen 2)) ؛// aaؤt pt: [1 ، 2] astyk.psh (4) ؛ knst wrzen 3 = astyk۔ lytstwrshn ؛ knswl.lwgh (astyk.yt ghyt anwrzen (wrzen 3)) ؛// aaؤt pt: [1 ، 2 ، 4] knswl.lwgh (astyk.jyt wyns (wrzen 1)) ؛// aaؤt pt: [1 ، 2 ، 3] knswl.lagh (astyk. tap ()) ؛// aaؤt pt: 4 un msaal kay tawr par ، astyk nwda klas astyk main nwda ki nmaindghy krty haay۔har nwda main astyk main aghlay nwda ka ayk kdr aur ayk hawalha hawta haay۔ mstkl astyk klas astyk dayta dahanchay ko mstkl tawr par nafza krta haay۔yha astyk kay mkhtlf wrzen ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye ayk lght (wrzen) astamal krta haay۔har wrzen ayk mnfrd wrzen nmbr kay sath wabstha haay۔ psh tarykha ayk nya nwda bna kar aur astyk kay tazaha trien wrzen ko ap dayt krkay astyk main ayk niy kdr ka azuafha krta haay۔ pap tarykha kar kay tazaha trien wrzen ko ap dayt krkay astyk sy tap ansar ko hata dyta haay۔astyk۔ upar ka tarykha tazaha trien wrzen main astyk kay awpry ansar ki kdr lwtata haay۔ ghyt wywrshn ka tarykha nwdas ko abwr krkay aur akdar ki ayk saf ko waps krkay astyk ka ayk mkhsawsa wrzen bazayaft krta haay۔ msaal kay tawr par astamal kay hasaay main ، hum tkhlyk karty hayn۔ayk mstkl astyk ، is par akdar ko dhkylyn ، aur ghyt wywrshn kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey astyk kay mkhtlf wrzen bazayaft kryn۔ham upar kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey astyk kay awpry ansar tak rsaiy haasal karnay ki salahayt ka bhi mzaaharha karty hayn۔

Question: wrda frykwynsy-anwrswrs dstawyza frykwynsy (TF-IDF) aur mtn kay tjzayay main is kay astamal kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: do dawrwn kay mabyn mkhtsar trien mshtrkha baladsty tlash karnay kay l you ، aap mthark prwghramngh astamal krsktay hayn۔taip askrpt main ayk msaal kay nfaza yahan haay: taip askrpt kwpy kwdafkshn sharst kamns aprsywnsy (str1: strngh ، str2: strngh): strngh {const m = str1.length ؛const n = str2.length ؛// mshtrkha sprsywynss kans day py ki lmbaiy ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye ayk tybl bnaiyn: nmbr [] [] = [] ؛// tybl ko shrwa karain (aaiyay i = 0 ؛ i <= m ؛ i ++) {dp [i] = niy srny (n+1). fl (0) ؛} // (i = 1 ؛ i <= m ؛ i ++) {for (j = 1 ؛ j <= n ؛ j ++) {if (str1 [i - 1] === str2 [j- 1]) {dp [i] [j] = 1 + dp [i - 1] [j - 1] ؛} else {dp [i] [j] = math.max (dp [i - 1] [j] ، dp [i] [j - 1]) ؛table}}} // tybl ka astamal karty hoey mkhtsar trien aam sprsyiyns ki tamyr karain ، sprsyins = "" ؛i = m ؛j = n ؛jbkha (i> 0 && j> 0) {aghr (str1 [i - 1] === str2 [j - 1]) {supressequence = str1 [i - 1] + sprsywnsy ؛myn--؛J-- ؛} dusri sawrt main (dp [i - 1] [j]> dp [i] [j - 1]) {supresequence = str1 [i - 1] + sprsyiyns ؛myn--؛} else {supersequence = str2 [j - 1] + sprsyiyns ؛J-- ؛}} // str1 sy baky harwf shaml karain jabky (i> 0) {supersequence = str1 [i - 1] + sprsyins ؛myn--؛} // str2 sy baky harwf shaml karain jabky (j> 0) {supersequence = str2 [j - 1] + sprsyiyns ؛J-- ؛sup sprsyins ki wapsy ؛} // msaal kay tawr par astamal: kanst str1 = "aggtab" ؛ const str2 = "gxtxayb" ؛ const const const ould = shortscommonsupersequence (str1 ، str2) ؛ knswl.lwgh ("mkhtsar trien mshtrkha saabn:" ، ntyjha) ؛ is main ؛msaal kay tawr par ، sharst kamns aprysywyns fnkshn do dawr lyta hay ، STR1 aur STR2 ، kywnkha un pt aur mkhtsar trien aam sprsyins ko lwtata haay۔ fnkshn STR1 aur STR2 kay mshtrkha sprsywyns ki lmbaiy kay sath ayk tybl (DP) ko bhrnay kay liye mthark prwghramngh nktaha nzar ka astamal krta haay۔tybl ko nchlay hasaay main bhra hoa hay ، js main hr pwzayshn par STR1 aur STR2 kay krdarwn ka mwazanha kya jata haay۔ tybl ko bhrnay kay bad ، fnkshn tybl kay nechay dien kwnay sy byk tryk karty hoey mkhtsar trien mshtrkha baladsty ki tamyr krta haay۔yha STR1 aur STR2 kay krdarwn ka mwazanha krta hay aur fysalha krta hay keh aya krdar ko sprsyins main shaml kya jaye ya zayada sy zayada lmbaiy kay sath mlhakha syl main mntkl kya jaiay۔dw msaal kay tarwn (str1 aur str2) kay sath mkhtsar trien kamnsprsykwyns fnkshn۔as kay ntyjay main kam trien mshtrkha sprsyins knswl par chhpy hui haay۔

Question: jnrytw madalngh kay l a mtghyr aatw aynkwdar (VAE) ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: lahakha drkht ko nafza karna ayk pychydha kam hay ، lekin main aap ko shrwa karnay kay liye ayk jaizaha aur kwda tymplyt fraham krskta hawn۔taip askrpt main ayk lahakha drkht ka bnyady nfaza yahan haay: taip askrpt kwpy kwdaklas lahakha lahakha lahakha {bchay: {[klyd: strngh]: lahakha astrynwda} ؛shrwa kryn: nmbr ؛akhttam: nmbr ؛knstrktr (shrwa: nmbr ، akhttam: nmbr) {this.children = {} ؛this.start = start ؛this.end = end ؛} aydaailda (klyd: strngh ، nwda: lahakha): batal {this.children [key] = nwda ؛} ghytaida (klyd: strngh): lahakha astrynwda |ghyr wzuahaty {as ko waps kryn۔ bchwn [klyd] ؛} haaschlda (klyd: strngh): bwlyn {as main rytrn klyd۔ bchwn ؛}} klas lahakha {jra: lahakha ؛mtn: tar ؛knstrktr (mtn: strngh) {this.text = mtn ؛this.root = nya lahakha astrynwda (-1 ، -1) ؛this.buildtree () ؛} blda try (): batal {const n = this.text.length ؛kay liye (aaiyay i = 0 ؛ i <n ؛ i ++) {mwjwdha = this.root ؛kay liye (j = i ؛ j <n ؛ j ++) {const key = this.text [j] ؛aghr (mwjwdha۔} else {const newnode = nya lahakha astrynwda (j ، n - 1) ؛mwjwdha.adaaidaaida (klyd ، nyw nwda) ؛mwjwdha = newnode ؛}}}} tlash (pytrn: strngh): bwlyn {aaiyay mwjwdha = this.root ؛kay liye (aaiyay i = 0 ؛ i <pytrn. lmbaiy ؛ i ++) {const key = pytrn [i] ؛aghr (mwjwdha۔} dusri {jhwty lwt ؛}} sch waps ؛}} // msaal kay tawr par astamal: kanst tykst = "kylay" ؛ kanst lazmi = nya lahakha (mtn) ؛ knswl.lwgh (lahakha۔ srch ("ayn aay")) ؛// aaؤt pt: trueconsole.log (lahakha. search ("ana")) ؛// aaؤt pt: trueconsole.log (lahakha۔ srch ("ana")) ؛// aaؤt pt: trueconsole.log (lahakha۔ srch ("aypl")) ؛// aaؤt pt: is msaal kay tawr par ، lahakha lahakha klas lahakha drkht main ayk nwda ki nmaindghy krta haay۔har nwda main sbstrngh kay aaghaza aur akhttamy pwzayshnwn aur is kay bchwn kay nwdas ka nkshha kay baray main malwmat hawty haay۔ lahakha klas lahakha drkht kay dayta dahanchay ko nafza krta haay۔as main ayk rwt nwda aur ayk tykst praprty hay jo asal mtn ki nmaindghy krty haay۔ blda try ka tarykha mtn main hr krdar par tkrar krkay aur drkht main shaml krkay lahakha drkht ki tamyr krta haay۔jb zurwry ho tou yeh niay nwdas tyar krta hay aur mwjwdha nwda ko ap dayt krta hay kywnkha yeh drkht ko abwr krta haay۔ tlash ka tarykha lahakha drkht main dyiay gaye nmwnha ki tlash krta haay۔yha jra sy shrwa hawta hay aur is rastay ki pyrwy krta hay jo pytrn kay krdarwn sy mlta haay۔ msaal kay tawr par astamal kay hasaay main ، hum "kylay" kay mtn sy ayk lahakha drkht bnatay hain aur kuch tlashyn karty hain takha yeh malwm kya jaskay keh drkht main kuch nmwnay mwjwd hain ya nhayn۔yha ayk lahakha drkht ka bnyady nfaza hay ، aur zayada aaly drjay ki afadyt jesay astrngh kay swalat ko snbhalna ، sab sy tawyl aam strngh tlash karna ، ya mymwry kay astamal ko bhatr bnana aap ki zurwryat kay mtaabk shaml kya jaskta haay۔

Question: tdryjy frwgh denay main jld rknay ka mksad kya hay aur yeh kesay kam krta haay؟
Answer: kesi dyiay gaye tar main sab sy tawyl pylndarwmk mtzuad tlash karnay kay l you ، aap mthark prwghramngh astamal krsktay hayn۔taip askrpt main ayk msaal kay nfaza yahan haay: taip askrpt kwpy kwdafkshn sab sy tawyl palndrmkswbsyns (ays ty aar: strngh): strngh {const n = str.length ؛kanst day py: nmbr [] [] = [] ؛// tybl ko shrwa karain (aaiyay i = 0 ؛ i <n ؛ i ++) {dp [i] = nya srny (n). fl (0) ؛day py [i] [i] = 1 ؛// ayk hi krdar lmbaiy 1} // kay liye tybl ko nechay kay andaza main bhryn (lyn = 2 ؛ lyn <= n ؛ lyn ++) {kay liye (i = 0 ؛ i <n - lyn+)1 ؛ i ++) {const j = i+lyn - 1 ؛aghr (str [i] === str [j] && lyn === 2) {dp [i] [j] = 2 ؛} wrnha agar (str [i] === str [j]) {dp [i] [j] = dp [i + 1] [j - 1] + 2 ؛} else {dp [i] [j] = math.max (dp [i] [j - 1] ، dp [i + 1] [j]) ؛}}} // sab sy tawyl palindromic mtzuad ki tshkyl nw i = 0 ؛aaiyay j = n - 1 ؛chlw mtnazaaha = '' ؛jbkha (i <j) {if (str [i] === str [j]) {mtzuad += str [i] ؛i ++ ؛J-- ؛} wrnha agar (dp [i] [j-1]> dp [i + 1] [j]) {j-- ؛} else {i ++ ؛}} // agar tar ki lmbaiy ajyb hay tou ، drmyany krdar ko shaml karain agar (i === j) {mtzuad += str [i] ؛} kay bad ki wapsy ؛} // msaal kay tawr par astamal: kansttr = 'kryktr' ؛ kanst tawyl arsaay sy sab sy tawyl arsaay sy trtyb = tawyl trynpalaindarwwmkswbsyns (ays ty aar) ؛ knswl.lwgh ('sb sy tawyl pylaindarwwmk mshtrkha:' ، tawyl arsaay sy tay .n) ؛ is msaal main ، sab sy tawyl arsaay sy ، sab sy tawyl arsaay tak ، ayk taryk trien fnkshn ayk tar ki tar lyta hay ،chwnkha un pt aur lwtata haay۔tybl ko nechay ki taraf bhr diya jata hay ، mkhtlf lmbaiywn kay zayly zakhyrwn par ghwr karty hoey aur yeh janchtay hoey keh aya srwn kay harwf brabr hain ya nhayn۔ tybl ko bhrnay kay bad ، fnkshn tybl kay awpry dien kwnay sy byk tryk krkay sab sy tawyl pylndarwmk mtzuad ki tshkyl nw krta haay۔yha ays ty aar kay krdarwn ka mwazanha krta hay aur fysalha krta hay keh aya is krdar ko bad main shaml karna hay ya zayada sy zayada lmbaiy kay sath mlhakha syl main mntkl hona haay۔msaal kay tawr par strngh (ays ty aar) kay sath kam kryn۔as kay ntyjay main sab sy tawyl pylndarwmk mtzuad knswl par chhapta haay۔

Question: aasaaby mshyn trjmay kay madalza main alfaza ki twjha kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ykyna!taip askrpt main rynk aur raha kay kmpryshn kay zaryaha ywnyn kay sath das daysyt syt dayta dahanchay ka nfaza yahan haay: taip askrpt kwpy kwdaklas daswait syt {waldyn: nmbr [] ؛drjha: nmbr [] ؛knstrktr (saiza: nmbr) {this.Pearnt = nya srny (saiza) ؛this.rank = niy saf (saiza) ؛kay liye (aaiyay i = 0 ؛ i <saiza ؛ i ++) {this.peart [i] = i ؛this.rank [i] = 0 ؛}} tlash karain (x: nmbr): nmbr {if (this.palent [x]! == x) {// rastha kmpryshn: paiay janay waly jra ko x ka waldyn bnaiyn۔. waldyn [x]) ؛this is ko waps kryn۔ waldyn [x] ؛} ywnyn (x: nmbr ، Y: nmbr): batal {const rootx = this.find (x) ؛kanst rwt = this.find (y) ؛aghr (rwt ayks! == rwt) {// ywnyn bazaria drjha: lmbay drkht ko lmbay drkht ki jra sy jwrayn agar (this.rank [rwtks] <this.rank [rwt]) {this.pearnt [rwt ayks] =jra ؛} dusri sawrt main agar (this.rank [rwt ayks]> yha۔ rynk [rwt]) {this.peart [rwt] = rwt ayks ؛} else {this.pearnt [rwt] = rwt ayks ؛this.rank [rootx] ++ ؛}}} isconnected (x: nmbr ، Y: nmbr): bwlyn {as ko waps kryn۔}} // msaal kay tawr par astamal: kwnst day ays = nya dasywintsyt (5) ؛ day ays ywn (0 ، 1) ؛ day ays ywn (2 ، 3) ؛ day ays ywn (1 ، 4) ؛ knswl.lwgh (ds.isconced(0 ، 4)) ؛// aaؤt pt: trueconsole.log (ds.isconnected (2 ، 4)) ؛// aaؤt pt: is par aml draamd ko ghalat ، nakarha tabkay ki klas das daysyt syt dayta dahanchay ki nmaindghy krty haay۔as main do safyn hayn: hr ansar kay waldyn ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye waldyn aur hr ansar kay drkht ki drjha bndy (tkhmynha ghharaiy) ko zakhyrha karnay kay liay۔ yeh knstrktr waldyn ki saf ko is tarah shrwa krta hay keh hr ansar abtdaiy tawr par is ka apna waldyn hawta hay ، aur drjha bndy abtdaiy tawr par hawty haay۔tmam zayrw۔ tlash karnay ka tarykha is syt ki jra (nmaindha) tlash krta hay js main dyiay gaye ansar X ka talk haay۔fainda aapryshn kay doran ، paiay janay waly jra ko mstkbl ki tlash kay l X ka braha rast waldyn bnanay kay liye path kmpryshn ka atalak kya jata hay ، jo drkhtwn kay dahanchay ko chpta karnay main mdd krta haay۔ ywnyn ka tarykha kar X aur Y kay zaryaha nmaindghy karnay waly do sytwn ka athaad anjam dyta haay۔as ko pehlay tlash kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey sytwn ki jrayn mil jati hayn۔as kay bad ، yeh jrawn ki safwn ka mwazanha krta hay aur drkht ko chhwtay drjay kay sath braay rynk kay sath jra sy jwrata haay۔aghr safyn brabr hain tou ، ayk drkht dusray kay sath mnslk hawta hay ، aur niy jra kay ahaday main azuafha hawta haay۔ agar is sy mnslk tarykha chyk krta hay keh agar do anasar X aur y apnay jra anasar ka mwazanha krkay ayk hi syt main hayn۔ msaal kay tawr par astamal kay hasaay main astamal kay hasaay myn۔، hum panch anasar kay sath napsndydha syt tshkyl dy kar napsndydha tabkay kay astamal ka mzaaharha karty hayn۔ham kuch ywnyn ki karwaiyan anjam dytay hain aur is sy mnslk tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey anasar ki rabtaay ki janch karty hayn۔ntaij knswl par chhapay gaye hayn۔

Question: zaban ki madalngh kay liye bar bar nywrl nyt wrk (RNN) ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: 2D jghha main pwaints kay ayk syt main pwaints ki kryb trien jwray tlash karnay kay l you ، aap tksym aur ftha alghwrthm ko "kryb trien jwray pwaints" alghwrthm kay nam sy jana jata haay۔taip askrpt main ayk msaal kay nfaza yahan haay: taip askrpt kwpy kwda antrfys pwaint {x: nmbr ؛Y: nmbr ؛} fnkshn ka fasalha (P1: nktaha ، P2: nktaha): nmbr {const Dx = p2.x - p1.x ؛const dy = p2.y - p1.y ؛waps myth۔ ays kyw aar ty (dx * dx + dy * dy) ؛} fnkshn brtfwrs (pwaints: pwaint [] ، shrwa: nmbr ، akhttam: nmbr): nmbr {aaiyay zahanyt = lamhadwdyt ؛kay liye (i = start ؛ i <= end ؛ i ++) {for (j = i+1 ؛ j <= end ؛ j ++) {kwnst dast = dastns (pwaints [i] ، pwaints [j]) ؛midestance = math.min (zahan sazay ، zula) ؛}} lwtnay wali zahanyt ؛} fnkshn astrp klwsyst (pwaints: pwaint [] ، saiza: nmbr ، zahan: nmbr): nmbr {aaiyay mnt = zahan sazay ؛kay liye (i = 0 ؛ i <saiza ؛ ++ i) {for (j = i +1 ؛ j <saiza && pwaints [j] .y - pwaints [i] .y <mnt ؛ ++ j) {kwnst dast = fasalha (pwaints [i] ، pwaints [j]) ؛MIN = math.min (mnt ، zula) ؛}} rytrn mnt ؛} fnkshn klwzatyl (pwaints: pwaint [] ، shrwa: nmbr ، akhttam: nmbr): nmbr {kanst saiza = akhttam - shrwa + 1 ؛aghr (saiza <= 3) {waps brtfwrs (pwaints ، astart ، akhttam) ؛} const MID = math.floor ((start + end) / 2) ؛mdapwaint = pwaints [drmyany] ko brkrar rakhien ؛kanst lyft dastns = kryby (pwaints ، astart ، wsta) ؛kwnt raitstyns = kryby (pwaints ، wsta + 1 ، akhttam) ؛midestance = math.min (baiyn bazaw ، dien tarf) ؛kanstrp: pwaint [] = [] ؛aaiyay j = 0 ؛kay liye (i = start ؛ i <= end ؛ i ++) {if (math.abs (pwaints [i] .x - mdapwaint. x) <zahanyt) {pty [j] = pwaints [i] ؛J ++ ؛st} kwnstrp dastns = astrp klwsyst (pty ، jay ، zahan sazay) ؛rytrn myth myn (zahan sazay ، strp dastyns) ؛} fnkshn klwza astyt pyir (pwaints: pwaint []): nmbr {pwaints.swrt ((a ، b) => a.x - b.x) ؛kryb kryb waps (pwaints ، 0 ، pwaints۔ lmbaiy - 1) ؛} // msaal kay astamal: kanst pwaints: pwaint [] = [{x: 2 ، y: 3} ، {x: 12 ، y: 30} ، {x: 40 ، Y: 50} ، {x: 5 ، Y: 1} ، {x: 12 ، y: 10} ، {x: 3 ، y: 4} ،] ؛ mndastyns = kryb trien (pwaints) ؛ knswl۔lagh ('kryb trien jwray ka fasalha:' ، zahan sazay) ؛ is aml main ، nktaha antrfys 2D jghha main ayk nktaha ki nmaindghy krta hay ، js main X aur Y kwaardaynyt hawtay hayn۔ fasalay ki tkryb fasalay kay farmwlay ka astamal karty hoey do pwaints kay mabyn yklydayn fasalay ka hasab lghaty haay۔ayk haylpr fnkshn hay jo brwt fwrs kay nktaha nzar ka astamal karty hoey bohat kam pwaints kay darmiyan kryb trien jwray kay fasalay ka hasab lghata haay۔ astrp klwsyst fnkshn ayk aur mddghar fnkshn hay jo ayk dyiay gaye chwraaiy ki pty main mwjwd pwaints kay darmiyan kryb trien jwray kay fasalay ka hasab lghata haay۔fnkshn hay

Question: lajstk ryghryshn madal main L1 aur L2 ko bakaadha bnanay main kya frk haay؟
Answer: ykyna!taip askrpt main by try dayta dahanchay ka nfaza yahan haay: taip askrpt kwpy kwdaklas btrynwda <T> {chabyan: ty [] ؛bchay: btreenode <t> [] ؛aslyf: bwlyn ؛knstrktr (slyf: bwlyn) {this.keys = [] ؛this.children = [] ؛this.isleaf = sileaf ؛}} klas btree <t> {jra: btreenode <t> ؛daghry: nmbr ؛knstrktr (daghry: nmbr) {this.root = null ؛this.degree = daghry ؛} tlash (klyd: ty): bwlyn {as ko waps kryn۔} dakhl karain (klyd: ty): batal {aghr (this.root === null) {this.root = nya Btreenode <T> (sch) ؛this.root.keys.push (key) ؛} dusri {aghr (this.root.keys.length === (2 * this.degree) - 1) {const newrot = new Btreenode <T> (ghlta) ؛newrot.children.push (this.root) ؛this.splichild (newrot ، 0 ، this.root) ؛this.root = newrot ؛} this.insertnonfull (this.root ، key) ؛}} praiywyt srch nwda (nwda: Btreenode <T> ، key: t): bwlyn {aaiyay i = 0 ؛jbkha (i <node.keys.length && & key> node.keys [i]) {i ++ ؛} if (i <node.keys.length && & & key === nwda.kys [i]) {sch waps ؛} if (node.isleaf) {jhwty lwt ؛this is ko waps kryn۔} njy Insertnonfull (nwda: btreenode <t> ، key: t): batal {aaiyay i = node.keys.length - 1 ؛if (node.isleaf) {jbkha (i> = 0 && & & key <node.keys [i]) {node.keys [i + 1] = node.keys [i] ؛myn--؛} node.keys [i + 1] = klyd ؛} dusri {jbkha (i> = 0 && & & key <node.keys [i]) {i-- ؛} i ++ ؛if (node.children [i] .keys.length === (2 * this.degree) - 1) {this.splitchild (nwda ، i ، nwda.chaldayn [i]) ؛if (key> node.keys [i]) {i ++ ؛}} this.insertnonfull (node.children [i] ، klyd) ؛}} njy asplchylda (waldyn: Btreenode <T> ، andayks: nmbr ، bchha: Btreenode <T>): batal {const newnode = nya Btreenode <T> (child.isleaf) ؛pyrnt.Keys.splice (andayks ، 0 ، child.keys [this.degree - 1]) ؛pyrnt.krynyn.splys (andayks + 1 ، 0 ، nyw nwda) ؛newnode.keys = child.keys.splice (this.degree ، this.degree - 1) ؛if (! child.isleaf) {newnode.children = child.children.splice (this.degree ، this.degree) ؛}}} // msaal kay tawr par astamal: kanst btree = new btree <bunds> (3) ؛ btree.insert (5) ؛ btree.insert (10) ؛ btree.insert (3) ؛ btree.insert (1) ؛ btree.dakhl karain (7) ؛ knswl.lwgh (btree.search (3)) ؛// aaؤt pt: trueconsole.log (btree.search (6)) ؛// aaؤt pt: is par aml draamd ko fal karain ، Btreenode klas B-Tree main ayk nwda ki nmaindghy krta haay۔as main chabyan ki ayk saf ، chailda nwdas ki ayk saf hay ، aur ayk jhndaa is bat ki nshandhay krta hay keh aya nwda ayk pty nwda haay۔ by try klas by try dayta dahanchay ki nmaindghy krty haay۔as main jra ka nwda aur ayk daghry hay jo hr nwda main zayada sy zayada chabyan ka tayn krty haay۔

Question: ghym play ayjntwn main ghhary kmk sykhnay aur is kay atalak kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ykyna!taip askrpt main ghraf kay kam sy kam phylnay waly drkht (MST) tlash karnay kay liye krskl kay alghwrthm ka ayk msaal aml haay: taip askrpt kwpy kwdaklas ywnyn fainda {waldyn: nmbr [] ؛drjha: nmbr [] ؛knstrktr (saiza: nmbr) {this.Pearnt = nya srny (saiza) ؛this.rank = niy saf (saiza) ؛kay liye (aaiyay i = 0 ؛ i <saiza ؛ i ++) {this.peart [i] = i ؛this.rank [i] = 0 ؛}} tlash karain (x: nmbr): nmbr {if (this.palent [x]! == x) {this.palent [x] = this.find (this.palent [x]) ؛this is ko waps kryn۔ waldyn [x] ؛} ywnyn (x: nmbr ، Y: nmbr): batal {const rootx = this.find (x) ؛kanst rwt = this.find (y) ؛aghr (rwt ayks! == rwt) {aghr (this.rank [rwt ayks] <this.rank [rwt]) {this.palent [rwt ayks] = rwt ؛} dusri sawrt main agar (this.rank [rwt ayks]> yha۔ rynk [rwt]) {this.peart [rwt] = rwt ayks ؛} else {this.pearnt [rwt] = rwt ayks ؛this.rank [rootx] ++ ؛}}}} klas ayj {makhza: nmbr ؛mnzal: nmbr ؛wzan: tadad ؛tamyr knndha (makhza: nmbr ، mnzal: nmbr ، wzan: nmbr) {this.source = makhza ؛this.destination = mnzal ؛yha۔ wzan = wzan ؛class} klas ghraf {knarwn: knaray [] ؛knstrktr () {this.edges = [] ؛} aydaj (makhza: nmbr ، mnzal: nmbr ، wzan: nmbr): batal {kant ayj = nya knaray (makhza ، mnzal ، wzan) ؛this.edges.push (knaray) ؛} krsklmst (): ayj [] {this.edges.sort ((a ، b) => a.weight - b.weight) ؛kanst ywnyn fainda = nya ywnyn fainda (this.edges.length) ؛kanst aym ays ty: ayj [] = [] ؛kay liye (as kay liay۔kwnt rwtstynyshn = ywnyn fainda.fainda (ayj.daystynyshn) ؛aghr (rwt swrs! == rwt dastynyshn) {MST.push (knaray) ؛ywnyn fainda daat ywn (rwt swrs ، rwt dastynyshn) ؛}} wapsy MST ؛}} // msaal kay tawr par astamal: kanst ghraf = nya ghraf () ؛ ghraf.adayj (0 ، 1 ، 4) ؛ ghraf.dayj (0 ، 7 ، 8) ؛ ghraf.dayj (1 ، 2 ، 8) ؛ ghraf۔aydajda (1 ، 7 ، 11) ؛ ghraf.dayj (2 ، 3 ، 7) ؛ ghraf.dayj (2 ، 8 ، 2) ؛ ghraf.adayj (2 ، 5 ، 4) ؛ ghraf.adayj (3 ، 4 ،9) ؛ ghraf.dayj (3 ، 5 ، 14) ؛ ghraf.dayj (4 ، 5 ، 10) ؛ ghraf.adayj (5 ، 6 ، 2) ؛ ghraf.adayj (6 ، 7 ، 1) ؛ ghraf۔ aydajdaj.lagh (`$ {Edge.Source} - $ {Edge.destination} ، wzan: $ {ayj. wyt}`) ؛} is nfaza main ، ywnyn fainda klas rynk kay zaryaha ywnyn ft kmpryshn aur ywnyn kay sath ywnyn ft dayta dahanchay ki nmaindghy krta haay۔as ka astamal alghwrthm kay doran naghwar sytwn par nzar rkhnay kay liye kya jata haay۔ knaray ki klas ghraf main ayk knaray ki nmaindghy krty hay ، js main makhza wrtyks ، mnzal mksawd aur wzan ko zakhyrha kya jata haay۔

Question: klstrngh kay liye khud sy mnzam nkshha (SOM) ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ykyna!taip askrpt main tryp dayta dahanchay ka nfaza yahan haay: taip askrpt kwpy kwdaklas tryp nwda <T> {klyd: nmbr ؛kymt: ty ؛trjyha: nmbr ؛baiyn: tryp nwda <t> |khaly؛daiyn: tryp nwda <t> |khaly؛knstrktr (klyd: nmbr ، kdr: t) {this.key = key ؛this.value = value ؛this.priority = math.random () ؛this.left = null ؛this.right = null ؛class} klas tryp <t> {jra: tryp nwda <t> |khaly؛knstrktr () {this.root = null ؛} praiywyt rwtyt lft (nwda: tryp nwda <t>): tryp nwda <t> {kwnt raitchaida = nwda. rait !؛node.right = rightild.left ؛raitchlda daat lyft = nwda ؛raitaida waps ؛} njy rwtyrait (nwda: tryp nwda <T>): tryp nwda <T> {kanstyt lyftaida = nwda۔ lyft !؛node.left = lifthild.right ؛baiyn bchay۔ rait = nwda ؛baiyn bazaw ki wapsy ؛} njy dakhlha (nwda: tryp nwda <T> | NULL ، KEY: nmbr ، kdr: T): tryp nwda <T> {aghr (nwda === NULL) {nya tryp nwda <T> (klydy ، kdr) waps lwtaiyn ؛} if (key <node.key) {node.left = this.insertnode (node.left ، key ، value) ؛aghr (nwda.lft!}} dusri sawrt main agar (key> nwda.ky) {nwda۔ rait = this.insertnode (nwda. rait ، klyd ، kdr) ؛if (node.right! .priority <node.priority) {nwda = this.rotateleft (nwda) ؛}} wapsy nwda ؛} dakhl karain (klyd: nmbr ، kdr: ty): batal {this.root = this.insertnode (this.root ، klyd ، kdr) ؛} njy daylytynwda (nwda: tryp nwda <t> | null ، key: nmbr): tryp nwda <T> |null {if (nwda === null) {wapsy NULL ؛} if (key <node.key) {node.left = this.deletenode (node.left ، key) ؛} dusri sawrt main agar (key> nwda.ky) {nwda. rait = this.deletenode (node.right ، key) ؛} else {if (node.left === null && node.right === null) {waps waps ؛} wrnha agar (node.left === null) {nwda = this.rotateleft (nwda) ؛} wrnha agar (nwda.rait === null) {nwda = this.rotateright (nwda) ؛} else {if (node.left.priority <node.right.priority) {nwda = this.rotateright (nwda) ؛} dusri {nwda = this.rotateleft (nwda) ؛}} nwda = this.deletenode (nwda ، klyd) ؛} wapsy nwda ؛} hazaf karain (klyd: nmbr): batal {this.root = this.deletenode (this.root ، key) ؛} njy srch nwda (nwda: tryp nwda <t> | null ، key: nmbr): t |null {if (nwda === null) {wapsy NULL ؛} if (key === node.key) {wapsy nwda.wlyw ؛} dusri sawrt main agar (klyd <nwda.ky) {as ki tlash kryn۔} else {as ko waps kryn۔ srchnwda (nwda. rait ، klyd) ؛}} tlash (klyd: nmbr): ty |null {as ko waps kryn۔ srchnwda (this.root ، key) ؛}} // msaal kay tawr par astamal: const tryp = nya tryp <strngh> () ؛ tryp.nsrt (5 ، "aypl") ؛ try

Question: mlty klas drjha bndy main sahat sy mtalk aur yad kay darmiyan kya frk haay؟
Answer: ykyna!taip askrpt ka astamal karty hoey tarwn ki ayk saf kay darmiyan sab sy tawyl mshtrkha sabkha tlash karnay kay liye ayk msaal ka prwghram yeh haay: taip askrpt kwpy kwdafkshn tawyl trien kamwmn pryfks (ays ty aar ays: strngh []): strngh {aghr (str.length === 0) {wapsy '' ؛pref lyt pryfks = strs [0] ؛kay liye (i = 1 ؛ i <str.length ؛ i ++) {jbkha (strs [i]. indexof (sabkha)! == 0) {pryfks = pryfks.swbstrngh (0 ، sabkha۔ lmbaiy - 1) ؛aghr (sabkha === '') {waps '' ؛}}} wapsy ka sabkha ؛} // msaal kay astamal: kanstwr astrnghza = ['phwl' ، 'flw' ، 'flait'] const const mshtrkha pryfks = tawyl trien kamwmn pryfks (dawr) ؛ knswl.lwgh ('sb sy tawyl aam pryfks:' ، kamn prfks)؛// aaؤt pt: "FL" is prwghram main ، tawyl arsaay sy kam karnay wala fnkshn un pt kay tawr par tar ki ayk saf lyta hay aur un main sab sy tawyl aam sabkha waps krta haay۔ fnkshn srny main pehli tar kay sath sabkha mtghyr ko shrwa krta haay۔as kay bad ، yeh baky dawrwn kay zaryaay tkrar krta hay aur chyk krta hay keh agar andayksf tarykha astamal karty hoey hr tar ka sabkha ayk sabkha haay۔aghr pryfks kesi tar ka sabkha nahin hay tou ، yeh sabkha kay aakhry krdar ko hatata hay aur is aml ko jary rakhy ga jab tak keh ayk mshtrkha sabkha mil jata hay ya sabkha khaly nahin hawjata haay۔aghr koi mshtrkha sabkha mwjwd nahin hay tou khaly tar۔

Question: kdrty zaban prwsysngh kay kamwn main wrda 2 wy ay sy aymbydanghza aur un kay astamal kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ykyna!taip askrpt main rsy kay dayta dahanchay ka nfaza yahan haay: taip askrpt kwpy kwdaklas rwpynwda {baiyn: rwpynwda |tar ؛daiyn: rwpynwda |tar ؛wzan: tadad ؛knstrktr (baiyn: rwpynwda | strngh ، daiyn: rwpynwda | strngh) {this.left = baien ؛this.right = dien ؛this.weight = this.calculateweitt () ؛} njy hasab ktab (): nmbr {if (type of this.left === 'strngh') {as ko waps kryn۔} dusri {as ko waps kryn۔}}} klas rsy {jra: rwpynwda |tar ؛knstrktr (jra: rwpynwda | strngh) {this.root = jra ؛} praiywyt kwnktnwdas (nwda 1: rwpynwda | strngh ، nwda 2: rwpynwda | strngh): rwpynwda {nya rwpynwda waps karain (nwda 1 ، nwda 2) ؛} njy asplt nwda (nwda: rwpynwda ، andayks: nmbr): [rwpnwda |strngh ، rwpynwda |strngh] {if (index === 0) {wapsy [node.left ، node.right] ؛} dusri sawrt main agar (asharyha === nwda۔ wyt) {wapsy [nwda ، ''] ؛} wrnha agar (taipwf nwda۔ lyft === 'strngh') {kwnst lyftsbstrngh = nwda.lft.swbstrngh (0 ، andayks) ؛knst raitsbstrngh = nwda۔ lyft.swbstrngh (andayks) ؛wapsy [lyftsbstrngh ، raitsbstrngh + nwda۔ rait] ؛} wrnha agar (index <node.left.weight) {const [leftsplit ، hakwk plt] = this.splitnode (node.left as ropenode ، andayks) ؛wapsy [leftsplit ، this.concatnodes (hakwk ki jghha ، nwda. rait)] ؛} else {const [leftsplit ، hakwk plt] = this.splitnode (nwda۔ ropenode ، andayks - node.left.weight) ؛waps [this.concatnodes (node.left ، leftsplit) ، hakwk ki jghha] ؛}} dakhl karain (asharyha: nmbr ، mtn: strngh): batal {kanst [baiyn ، daiyn] = this.splitnode (yha.rwt btawr rwpynwda ، andayks) ؛const newnode = this.concatnodes (baiyn ، this.concatnodes (mtn ، daiyn)) ؛this.root = newnode ؛} hazaf karain (asharyha: nmbr ، lmbaiy: nmbr): batal {Const [baiyn 1 ، dien 1] = this.splitnode (yha.rwt btawr rwpynwda ، andayks) ؛kanst [baiyn 2 ، dien 2] = this.splitnode (daiyn 1 jesay rwpynwda ، lmbaiy) ؛this.root = this.concatnodes (baiyn 1 ، dien 2) ؛} tastrngh (): strngh {kanstngh ntyjha: strngh [] = [] ؛Const traverse = (nwda: rwpynwda | strngh) => {if (typeof nwda === 'strngh') {ntyjha. psh (nwda) ؛} else {traverse (node.left) ؛traverse (node.right) ؛}} ؛traverse (this.root) ؛wapsy ka ntyjha۔ join ('') ؛}} // msaal kay tawr par astamal: kwnst rsy = niy rsy (nya rwpynwda ('haylw ،' ، 'wrlda!')) ؛ rope.insert (7 ، 'khwbsawrt') ؛ rope.delete (0 ، 7) ؛ knswl۔lagh (rope.tostring ()) ؛// aaؤt pt: "khwbsawrt dnya!" is nfaza main ، rwpynwda klas rsy main ayk nwda ki nmaindghy krty hay ، js main ya tou tar (pty nwda) hawskta hay ya do bchwn kay nwdas (andrwny nwda) ka hawalha hawskta haay۔har nwda main ayk wzan ki praprty bhi hawty hay jo is nwda main zakhyrha shuda astrngh ki lmbaiy ki nmaindghy krty haay۔ rsy ki klas rsy kay aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay ki nmaindghy krty hay aur mkhsawsa asharywn par mtn ko dakhl karnay aur hazaf karnay kay tarykay mhaya krty hay ، aur sath hi rsy ko tar ki nmaindghy main tbdyl krty haay۔dakhl karnay ka tarykha mkhsawsa andayks par rsy ko alag krta hay ، niay mtn ko alyhadha nwda kay tawr par dakhl krta hay ، aur phir nwdas ko ayk sath mil jata haay۔

Question: mshyn trjmay kay liye transfarmr madal ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ykyna!taip askrpt main byl myn fwrda alghwrthm ka nfaza yahan haay: taip askrpt kwpy kwdaklas ayj {makhza: nmbr ؛mnzal: nmbr ؛wzan: tadad ؛tamyr knndha (makhza: nmbr ، mnzal: nmbr ، wzan: nmbr) {this.source = makhza ؛this.destination = mnzal ؛yha۔ wzan = wzan ؛class} klas ghraf {amwdy: nmbr ؛knarwn: knaray [] ؛knstrktr (amwdy: nmbr) {this.vertices = amwdy ؛this.edges = [] ؛} aydaj (makhza: nmbr ، mnzal: nmbr ، wzan: nmbr): batal {kant ayj = nya knaray (makhza ، mnzal ، wzan) ؛this.edges.push (knaray) ؛man byl myn fwrda (astartwrtyks: nmbr): nmbr [] {knst dastns: nmbr [] = nya srny (yha ۔wrtaits)fasalha [astartwrtyks] = 0 ؛kay liye (aaiyay i = 0 ؛ i <this.vertices - 1 ؛ i ++) {kay liye (as kay liay۔aghr (fasalha [makhza]! == nmbr.myks_wylyw && fasalha [makhza] + wzan <fasalha [mnzal]) {fasalha [mnzal] = fasalha [makhza] + wzan ؛}}} for (this.edges kay kwnst ayj) {const {makhza ، mnzal ، wzan} = knaray ؛aghr (fasalha [makhza]! == nmbr.myks_wylyw && fasalha [makhza] + wzan <fasalha [mnzal]) {niy ghltay phynk dyn ('ghraf main mnfy wzan ka chkr hawta haay') ؛}} wapsy ka fasalha ؛}} // msaal kay tawr par astamal: kanst ghraf = nya ghraf (5) ؛ ghraf.dayj (0 ، 1 ، 4) ؛ ghraf.dayj (0 ، 2 ، 3) ؛ ghraf.adayj (1 ، 2 ، -2) ؛ghraf.adayj (1 ، 3 ، 4) ؛ ghraf.dayj (1 ، 4 ، 2) ؛ ghraf.dayj (3 ، 2 ، 1) ؛ ghraf.adayj (3 ، 1 ، 5) ؛ ghraf.adayj (4 ،3 ، -3) ؛ kanst astartwrtyks = 0 ؛ kanstlst dastns = ghraf.byl myn fwrda (astartwrtyks) ؛ knswl.lwgh ('wrtyks sy mkhtsar fasalha' ، astartwrtyks) ؛ kay liye (i = 0 ؛ i <sharst dastyns.lnth ؛ i ++){knswl.lagh ('wrtyks' ، i ، ':' ، mkhtsar trien [i]) ؛} is aml main ، ayj klas ghraf main ayk knaray ki nmaindghy krta hay ، js main ayk makhza wrtyks ، mnzal mksawd ، aur wzan hawta haay۔ ghraf klasayk hadayt namha ghraf ki nmaindghy krta hay aur kesi dyiay gaye astart aykstryks sy mkhtsar trien fasalwn ko tlash karnay kay liye knarwn ko shaml karnay aur byl myn fwrda alghwrthm ko anjam denay kay tarykay mhaya krta haay۔ byl myn fwrda ka tarykha astart wrtyks sy mkhtsar fasalay ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye ayk saf ka fasalha shrwa krta haay۔as kay bad is ki tkrar hawty haay۔as kay bad ، yeh ghraf main mnfy wzan kay chkrwn ki janch pratal krta haay۔aghr mnfy wzan ka chkr mil jata hay tou ، ayk ghltay phynk di jati haay۔ fainl tawr par ، prwghram ghraf klas kay astamal ko ghraf bna kar ، knarwn ko shaml krkay ، aur byl myn fwrda alghwrthm chlanay sy zaahar krta hay takha ayk mkhsawsa astart wrtyks sy mkhtsar trien fasalwn ko tlash kya jaskay۔as kay bad klyl trien fasalwn ko knswl par chhpaya jata haay۔

Question: mjaza asaby nyt wrks main darap aaؤt ryghwlaizayshn ka mksad kya hay aur yeh kesay kam krta haay؟
Answer: ykyna!taip askrpt main wkfha kay drkht kay aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay ka nfaza yahan haay: taip askrpt kwpy kwdaklas wkfha {km: nmbr ؛aaly: nmbr ؛knstrktr (km: nmbr ، aaly: nmbr) {this.low = kam ؛this.high = aaly ؛class} klas antrwltrynwda {wkfha: wkfha ؛zayadha sy zayadha: nmbr ؛baiyn: antraltrynwda |khaly؛daiyn: antraltrynwda |khaly؛knstrktr (wkfha: wkfha) {this.interval = wkfha ؛this.max = wkfha۔ haaiy ؛this.left = null ؛this.right = null ؛class} klas antrwltry {jra: antrwyltrynwda |khaly؛knstrktr () {this.root = null ؛} praiywyt ghyt myks (A: nmbr ، B: nmbr ، C: nmbr): nmbr {rytrn myth۔ myks (A ، Math.max (B ، C)) ؛} njy Insertnode (nwda: antrwyltrynwda | NULL ، wkfha: wkfha): antrwyltrynwda {aghr (nwda ==== null) {nya antrwyltrynwda (wkfha) waps karain ؛} const {km} = wkfha ؛aghr (km <node.interval.low) {node.left = this.insertnode (node.left ، wkfha) ؛} else {node.right = this.insertnode (node.right ، wkfha) ؛} node.max = this.getMax (node.max ، wkfha. haaiy ، nwda. interval.high) ؛wapsy nwda ؛} dakhl karain (wkfha: wkfha): batal {this.root = this.insertnode (this.root ، wkfha) ؛} njy dawwrlap (wkfha 1: wkfha ، wkfha 2: wkfha): bwlyn {rytrn antrwywyl 1.low <= intraval2.high && interval2.low <= introal1.high ؛} njy srch awwrlypngh antrwlza (nwda: antrwyltrynwda | NULL ، wkfha: wkfha ، ntyjha: wkfha []): batal {aghr (nwda === null) {wapsy ؛} if (this.dooverlap (node.interval ، wkfha)) {ntyjha. psh (node.interval) ؛} agar (nwda.lft!} if (node.right! == null && node.right.Interval.low <= interval.high) {this.searchoverlapping intervals (nwda.rait ، wkfha ، ntyjha) ؛}} tlash (wkfha: wkfha): wkfha [] {kanstngh ntyjha: wkfha [] = [] ؛this.searchoverlapping intervals (this.root ، wkfha ، ntyjha) ؛wapsy ka ntyjha ؛}} // msaal kay tawr par astamal: kanst antrwwltry = nya antrwwltry () ؛ antrwwltry.srt (nya wkfha (15 ، 20)) inter antrwwltry.srt (nya wkfha (10 ، 30)) inter antrwwltry.nst (nya wkfha (5 ،20)) inter antrwwltry۔ INSERT (nya wkfha (12 ، 15)) inter antrwwltry.srt (nya wkfha (17 ، 19)) inter antrwwltry.srt (nya wkfha (30 ، 40)) const kans srchyntrwl = nya wkfha (14، ، 16) const vorelapping intervals = intervaltree.search (srchyntywrwl) ؛ knswl.lwgh ('awwr lypngh wkfay kay sath awwrlypngh wkfay' ، srch antrwwl ، ':') ؛ awwrlypngh antrwiwlza۔ farwrch ((wkfha) => {knswl۔.low ، '،' ، wkfha. HIGH ، ']') ؛}) ؛ is aml main ، wkfha tabkha ayk wkfha ki nmaindghy krta hay js main kam aur aaly kymt hawty haay۔wkfay kay drkht main ayk nwda ki nmaindghy krta hay ، js main wkfha hawta hay ، is kay wkfha aur awlad main zayada sy zayada kymt hawty hay ، aur baien aur dien bchay kay nwdas ka hawalha hawta haay۔ antrltry klas wkfha drkht kay aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay ki nmaindghy krta hay aur wkfwn ko dakhl karnay kay tarykay mhaya krta hay awr۔awwrlypngh wkfwn ki tlash kryn۔ dakhl karnay ka tarykha mwjwdha nwda kay wkfha kam kymt kay sath is ki kam kymt ka mwazanha krkay wkfha kay drkht main wkfha dakhl krta haay۔yha nwda ki zayada sy zayada aaly kymt ko ap dayt krta hay aur

Question: khud sakhtha sykhnay kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur kesi drkhwast ki msaal dyn۔
Answer: khud sakhtha sykhna ayk mshyn lrnngh tknyk hay js main ayk madal wazuha ansany tshryhaat ya lyblwn par bhrwsha kyay baghair baghair lybl waly dayta sy sykhta haay۔as kay bjaiay ، madal apnay sprwaizary sghnl bnanay kay liye dayta main mwjwd mwrwsay dahanchay ya malwmat ka faidha athata haay۔yha sghnlza madal ko aadad wa shmar sy many khyza khsawsayat ya nmaindghy nkalnay kay liye trbyt denay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔

Question: dstawyza klstrngh kay liye drjha bndy kay klstrngh madal ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: dstawyza klstrngh kay liye ayk drjha bndy kay klstrngh madal ki trbyt main aam tawr par mndrjha zayl aham akdamat shaml hawtay hayn: dayta ki tyary: dstawyzaat ka ayk mjmwaha jma karain jsay aap klstr karna chahti hayn۔ksy bhi ghair mtalkha malwmat ، jesay HTML tyghza ya awkaf ko hata kar dstawyzaat ko pehlay sy tyar kryn۔mtn ko mamwl par lanay ki tknyk anjam dyn jesay twknaizayshn ، astymngh ، aur astap alfaza ko klstrngh kay l a ayk mnasb shkl main tbdyl karnay kay liye astap alfaza ko hatana۔aam nktaha nzar main bygh aaf wrdaza madal ، asatalahay tadd-andars dstawyza frykwynsy (TF-IDF) wzan ، ya wrda 2 wy ay sy ya dstanay jesay lfza aymbydangh shaml hayn۔yha tknyk dstawyzaat ko fychr wyktr ya aymbydangh main tbdyl krty hayn۔ dastns ya mmasalt ka hasab ktab: kmpywt

Question: rjat psndy kay kamwn main mtalb askwairda ghltay (aym ays ay) aur mtalb mtalk ghltay (MAE) kay darmiyan kya frk haay؟
Answer: myyn askwairda ghltay (aym ays ay) aur mtalb mtalk ghltay (aym aay ay) dono rjat psndy kay kamwn main braay pymanay par astamal hony waly nksaan kay afaal hain ، lekin woh is main mkhtlf hain keh woh pysh ghwiy aur hakykt kay mabyn ghltaywn ki pymaish karty hayn۔

Question: transfarmr madalza main twjha kay tarykha kar kay tsawr aur zaban ko smjhnay kay kamwn main un kay astamal ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: twjha kay tarykha kar ayk hain

Question: kmk sykhnay kay liye ghhary Q-nyt wrk (DQN) ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ghhary Q-Network (DQN) ki trbyt main kmk sykhnay main kiy klydy akdamat shaml hayn۔as main shaml aham akdamat yeh hayn: mahawlyat ka syt ap: msilay ki shnakht aur is ki wzuahat kmk sykhnay kay kam kay tawr par kryn۔mahawl ya smylytr mrtb karain js kay sath ayjnt bat chyt kray gha۔yha mahawl ayjnt ko mshahadat fraham krta hay aur isy apni palysy ki bnyad par akdamat karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔har tjrbay main ayjnt ki haalt ، karrwaiy ki hogi ، ntyjay main anaam ، aur aghly ryast shaml hawty haay۔yha ry play mymwry sykhnay kay aml kay doran tsaadfy tawr par nmwnay lenay aur tjrbat ko dwbarha astamal krkay zayada mwsar trbyt ki ajazat dyty haay۔ nywrl nyt wrk fn tamyr: nywrl nyt wrk fn tamyr ko dayzaain karain ، aam tawr par ayk ghhary asaby

Question: mjaza aasaaby nyt wrks main bych ko mamwl par lanay ka mksad kya hay aur yeh kesay kam krta haay؟
Answer: bych narmlaizayshn ayk aysy tknyk hay jo trbyt kay doran hr mny bych kay andr antrmydayt srghrmywn ko mamwl par lanay kay liye mjaza aasaaby nyt wrks (sy ayn ayn) main astamal hawty haay۔as ka mksad nyt wrk kay sykhnay kay aml ki asthakam aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bnana haay۔ bych ko mamwl par lanay kay bnyady fwaid yeh hayn: dakhly kwwyrt shft sy nmtna: andrwny kwwyrt shft sy mrad is rjhaan sy hawta hay jahan nyt wrk kay aadanwn ki tksym main tbdyly aaty hay kywnkha is sy pehlay ki thawn kay pyramytrza hawtay hayn۔trbyt kay doran tazaha kary۔as sy aahastha aahastha asthakam aur mhatata wzan kay aaghaza ki zurwrt ka baasa bn sakta haay۔bych ko mamwl par lanay sy andrwny COV kay asarat kam hawjatay hain

Question: jnrytw aydawrsyryl nyt wrks (GANs) kay tsawr aur tsawyry trkyb main un kay astamal ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: jnrytw aydawrsyryl nyt wrk (GANs) mshyn lrnngh madalza ki ayk klas hay jo niay nmwnay tyar karnay kay liye astamal hawty hay jo dyiay gaye daytasyt sy mlty jlty haay۔GANs do aham ajzaaa par mushtamil haay: ayk jnrytr nyt wrk aur ayk amtyazay slwk nyt wrk۔an ko ayk mkhalf andaza main trbyt di jati hay ، jahan jnrytr amtyazay slwk ko bay wkwf bnanay kay liye hakykt psndanha nmwnay tyar karnay ki kwshsh krta hay ، jabky amtyazay slwk karnay waly ka mksad hakyky aur pyda hony waly nmwnwn main frk karna haay۔ amyj trkyb kay tnazar main GANs kis tarah kam karty hain is ka ayk jaizaha: jnrytr nyt wrk: jnrytr nyt wrk:jnrytr bay trtyb shwr ya ayk awykt wyktr ko un pt kay tawr par lyta hay aur isy hadf kay aadad wa shmar (jysay ، tsaawyr) ki jghha par nkshha dyta haay۔yha aam tawr par mtadd prtwn par mushtamil hawta hay ، bshmwl mkml tawr par mnslk ya mjazay prtwn ، is kay bad ayktywyshn afaal hawtay hayn۔jnrytr ka hadf hakykt psndanha nmwnay tyar karna hay jo hakyky aadad wa shmar ki tksym sy mltay jltay hayn۔

Question: fnkshn kay kryb hony kay liye rydayl bys fnkshn (aar by ayf) nyt wrk ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: fnkshn kay kryb hony kay liye rydayl bys fnkshn (aar by ayf) nyt wrk ki trbyt main kiy klydy akdamat shaml hayn۔as main shaml aham akdamat yeh hayn: dayta ki tyary: trynngh daytasyt tyar karain ، js main un pt aaؤt pt jwraay hawtay hain jo hadf ki tkryb ki nmaindghy karty hayn۔as bat ko ykyny bnaiyn keh daytasyt wsya pymanay par aadanwn ka ahaataha krta hay aur mtalwbha fnkshn ki drst nmaindghy krta haay۔

Question: kdrty zaban prwsysngh kay kamwn main lfza aymbydangh kay tsawr aur un kay astamal ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: lfza aymbydangh ayk aaly jhaty jghha main alfaza ki ghhnay wyktr nmaindghy hain ، jahan hr jhat lfza kay many kay ayk khasa phalw ko apni ghrft main lyty haay۔wha kdrty zaban prwsysngh (ayn ayl py) kay kamwn main braay pymanay par astamal hawtay hain takha alfaza kay mabyn manwy talkat ko apni ghrft main laiyn aur kmpywtr ko ansany zaban ko zayada mwsar tarykay sy smjhnay aur is par karrwaiy karnay kay kabl bnaiay۔ yahan lfza aymbydangh kay tsawr aur ayn ayl py kamwn main un kay astamal ka ayk jaizaha: lfza kay many ki nmaindghy: lfza aymbydangh ka mksad ayk mslsl wyktr ki jghha main alfaza ki nmaindghy karna hay ، jahan isi tarah kay alfaza ayk dusray kay kryb hawtay hain aur isi tarah kay syak wa sbak kay many banttay hayn۔rwayty wyrl nmaindghywn kay braks jesay ayk ghrm ankwdangh ، lfza aymbydanghs nay manwy talkat ko haasal kya aur lfza ki mmasalt aur mtalkha kay baray main malwmat haasal ky۔ tksym haaipw

Question: mshyn translyshn kay liye trtyb sy trtyb madal ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: mshyn trjmha kay liye trtyb sy trtyb (SEQ2SEQ) madal ki trbyt main kiy aham akdamat shaml hayn۔yhaan aam aml ka ayk jaizaha haay: aadad wa shmar ki tyary: ayk mtwazay karps jma karain js main makhza zaban kay jmlwn aur un kay mtalkha trjmay ko hadf zaban main jma kya jaiay۔ jmlay ko twknaizangh ، hayndalngh ، awkaf ، kam kyasngh ، aur kesi bhi zurwry mamwl ya safaiy sthraiy kay akdamat ka astamal krkay aadad wa shmar ko pysh kryn۔ankwdar daykwdar fn tamyr: SEQ2SEQ madal kay fn tamyr ko dayzaain karain ، jo ayk ankwdar aur daykwdar par mushtamil hawta haay۔ ankwdar makhza ki zaban ka jmlha un pt kay tawr par lyta hay aur is par amldraamd krta hay takha "syak wa sbak wyktr" kaha jata haay۔daykwdar syak wa sbak ko wyktr lyta hay aur trjmha shuda aaؤt pt jmlay ka lfza wrda .3 kay zaryaha tyar krta hay

Question: bay trtyb jnghl kay jwranay wali trbyt main jld rknay ka mksad kya hay aur yeh kesay kam krta haay؟
Answer: abtdaiy tawr par rkna ayk aysy tknyk hay jo bay trtyb jnghlat kay jwrawn ki trbyt main astamal hawty hay takha zayada sy zayada ftngh ko rwka jaskay aur amwmy karkrdghy ko bhatr bnaya jaskay۔jld rknay ka mksad ayk tlash karna hay

Question: aasaaby swal kay jwab denay waly madalza main alfaza ki twjha kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: aasaaby swal kay jwab denay waly madalza main ، alfaza ki twjha ayk aysa tarykha kar hay jo kesi mkhsawsa swal kay jwab sy mtalk un pt syak wa sbak main mkhsawsa alfaza ya twkn par mrkwza haay۔as sy madal ko un alfaza ki shnakht aur zayada ahamyt denay main mdd mlty hay jo jwab pyda karnay kay liye anthaaiy aham hayn۔ aasaaby swal kay jwab denay waly madalza main alfaza ki twjha kis tarah kam krty haay: madal fn tamyr: aasaaby swal kay jwab denay waly madal aam tawr par ayk ankwdar daykwdar fn tamyr par mushtamil hawtay hain ، jysaymkbwl tslsl sy trtyb (SEQ2SEQ) madal ya is kay mkhtlf ، transfarmr madal۔ ankwdar un pt syak wa sbak par karrwaiy krta hay (jysay ، ayk pyraghraf ya ayk dstawyza) aur isy pwshydha ryastwn ya srayt kay slslay main tbdyl krta haay۔ daykwdar pyda krta haayankwda shuda syak wa sbak ki nmaindghy main shrkt krkay jwab۔ bat chyt ka tarykha kar: twjha ka tarykha kar ajazat dyta hay

Question: mtn ki nsl kay liye jnrytw aydawrsyryl nyt wrk (GAN) ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: tykst jnryshn kay liye jnrytw aydawrsyryl nyt wrk (GAN) ki trbyt main bohat sy akdamat shaml hayn۔aghrchha GANs aam tawr par tsawyry trkyb jesay kamwn kay liye astamal hawtay hain ، lekin mtn ki mtzuad nwayt ki wjha sy GANs kay sath tykst jnryshn zayada mshkl haay۔taham ، mshrwta GANs ya tykst GANS jesay mkhtlf ksmyn mtn ki nsl kay liye astamal ki jaskty hayn۔tykst jnryshn kay liye ayk GAN ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat yeh hayn: dayta ki tyary: mtn ki msaalwn ka daytasyt jma karain ، jo jmlay ، pyraghraf ya dstawyzaat hawsktay hayn۔ tyknaizangh ، astap wrdaza ko hatana ، khsawsay krdarwn ko snbhalnay ، aur anjam denay kay zaryaha tykst dayta ko pysh kryn۔safaiy kay dyghr zurwry akdamat۔ mtn kay aadad wa shmar ko addy nmaindghy main shaml karain ، jesay lfza aymbydangh ya ayk ghrm ankwdangh۔

Question: spwrt wyktr mshynwn (ays wy aym) main L1 aur L2 ko bakaadha bnanay main kya frk haay؟
Answer: spwrt wyktr mshynwn (ays wy aym) main ، ayl 1 aur ayl 2 ryghwlraizayshn mkhtlf jrmanay ki shraita ka hawalha dytay hain jo mksad kay fnkshn main bakaadghy ki asatalaha shaml krkay awwr ftngh ko kntrwl karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔SVM main L1 aur L2 ryghwlraizayshn kay darmiyan frk yeh haay: L1 ryghwlraizayshn (LASSO): L1 bakaadghy sy mksad ki tkryb main jrmanay ki asatalaha kay tawr par ghtank ki mtalk akdar ka azuafha hawta haay۔ yeh madal ko kuch ghtankwn ko balkl frwgh dy kar wyrl ghtank ki hawsalha afzaaiy krta haay۔safr.ayl 1 ryghwlraizayshn khsawsayt kay antkhab kay l useful mfyd saabt hawskty hay kywnkha yeh khwdkar khsawsayt kay antkhab ko mؤsar tarykay sy anjam denay kay liye kam aham khsawsayat ko safr sy skraty haay۔ L1 bakaadghy ki asatalaha ki nmaindghy ki jaskty haay: λ * || W ||pyramytr aur || dablyw || ₁

Question: palysy tdryj kay tsawr aur un kay astamal ko kmk sykhnay main astamal kryn۔
Answer: palysy ghrydaynt palysy pyramytrza ko braha rast bhatr bna kar ayk ayjnt ko zayada sy zayada palysy tlash karnay ki trbyt denay kay liye kmk lrnngh (aar ayl) main astamal hony waly alghwrthm ki ayk klas hayn۔wylyw par mbny tarykwn kay braks js ka mksad wylyw fnkshn ka andazaha lghana hay ، palysy tdryjy tarykay braha rast ayk pyramytraizada palysy sykhtay hain jo nkshha sazay krta haay۔

Question: ghair nghrany shuda sykhnay kay liye ghhary akydha nyt wrk (DBN) ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ghhary akydha nyt wrk (DBN) ki trbyt main kiy akdamat shaml hayn۔ayk day by ayn ayk ksm ka jnrytw madal hay js main ayk dusray kay upar sja dyiay gaye mhadwd bwltzaman mshynwn (aar by aym) ki mtadd prtwn par mushtamil hawta haay۔ghyr mnkwlha sykhnay kay liye day by ayn ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat yeh hayn: aar by aym kay sath pysh ksh: day by ayn ki hr prt ko ayk prt kay lhaaza sy aar by aym kay tawr par pysh kya jata haay۔ un pt dayta par aar by aym ki trbyt krkay pehli prt kay sath shrwa kryn۔phala aar by aym trbyt yaftha hay ، is ki pwshydha prt ki srghrmyan aghly prt main aar by aym ko trbyt denay kay liye un pt kay tawr par astamal ki jati hayn۔ is aml ko is wkt tak jary rakhien jab tak keh day by ayn main mwjwd tamam aar by aym prytrynytda nahin hayn۔

Question: ghawsy mkschr madal (jy aym aym) ki trbyt main jld rknay ka mksad kya hay aur yeh kesay kam krta haay؟
Answer: ghawsy mkschr madal (jy aym aym) ki trbyt main ، abtdaiy astapngh ayk aysy tknyk hay jo zayada sy zayada ftngh ko rwknay aur trbyty aml ko rwknay kay liye madal ko aam karnay ko bhatr bnanay kay liye astamal ki jati haay۔jld rknay ka mksad madal ki pychydghy aur karkrdghy kay mabyn ayk zayada sy zayada tjart ki tlash karna haay۔jy aym aym trynngh main abtdaiy astapngh kis tarah kam krty haay: trbyt ki tkrar: jy aym aym ki trbyt main aam tawr par ayk tkrary alghwrthm shaml hawta hay ، jesay twka-myksymaizayshn (ay aym) alghwrthm۔ aym ay aym alghwrthm madal pyramytrza ko mshahadha shuda aadad wa shmar kay amkanat ko zayada sy zayada karnay kay liye madal pyramytrza ko ap dayt krta haay۔awr amkan: jesay jesay tkrar ki tadad brahty jarhay hay ، jy aym aym madal zayada pychydha aur kar sakta hay

Question: kdrty zaban prwsysngh kay kamwn main lfza syns dasghryshn aur is kay astamal kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: wrda syns daysymbyghyshn (dablyw ays day) kesi mkhsawsa syak wa sbak main kesi lfza kay mtalwbha many ya ahasas ka tayn karnay ka kam haay۔kdrty zaban prwsysngh (ayn ayl py) main ، alfaza main aksar mtadd mmknha hawas hawtay hain ، aur dablyw ays day ka mksad is syak wa sbak ki bnyad par anthaaiy mnasb ahasas ka antkhab karna hay js main lfza zaahar hawta haay۔mksad zaban ki tfhaym ki drstghy aur bhaaw NLP kamwn ki drstghy ko bhatr bnana haay۔yhaan lfza syns dasghryshn kay tsawr aur ayn ayl py main is kay astamal ki wzuahat haay: lfza main abhaam ka mtalb haay: kdrty zaban main bohat sy alfaza kay syak wa sbak kay lhaaza sy mtadd many ya hawas hawtay hayn۔ msaal kay tawr par ، lfza "bynk" A ka hawalha dy sakta haay۔

Question: tsawyry jnryshn kay liye mjaza mtghyr aatw aynkwdar (CVAE) ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ayk mjazay mtghyr aatw aynkwdar (CVAE) ki trbyt main tsawyry jnryshn kay liye jnrytw madal sykhnay kay l several kiy akdamat shaml hayn۔CVAE mtghyrat aatw ankwdarza (VAEs) aur knfywil nywrl nyt wrks (CNNs) kay tsawrat ko jwrata hay takha tsaawyr ki tksym ko haasal kya jaskay aur niy tkhlykat pyda ki jaskyn۔tsawyry jnryshn kay liye CVAE ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat yahan hayn: dayta ki tyary: CVAE ki trbyt kay liye tsaawyr ka ayk daytasyt tyar kryn۔(jysay ، saiza tbdyl karna ، fsal)

Question: kdrty zaban prwsysngh kay kamwn main lfza aymbydangh kay tsawr aur un kay astamal ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: lfza aymbydangh kdrty zaban prwsysngh (ayn ayl py) main ayk bnyady tknyk hay jo alfaza ki nmaindghy krty hay js main ayk mslsl wyktr ki jghha main ghhnay ، kam jhaty wyktr ki nmaindghy hawty haay۔lfza aymbydangh ka tsawr is khyal par mbny hay keh isi tarah kay many waly alfaza main wyktr ki tarah ki nmaindghy hawty hay ، js sy mshynyn manwy talkat aur syak wa sbak sy mtalk malwmat haasal karnay kay kabl hawjaty hayn۔yhaan lfza aymbydangh kay tsawr aur ayn ayl py kay kamwn main un kay astamal ki wzuahat haay: lfza ki nmaindghy: rwayty tawr par ، ayn ayl py main alfaza ko ayk ghrm wyktr ki haysayt sy pysh kya gaya tha ، jahan hr lfza ki nmaindghy ayk wyrl wyktr kay zaryaha ki jati haay۔

Question: jzabat kay tjzayay kay liye bar bar aasaaby nyt wrk (RNN) ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: jzabat kay tjzayay kay liye bar bar aasaaby nyt wrk (RNN) ki trbyt main ayk madal ki tamyr kay l several kiy akdamat shaml hain jo kesi dyiay gaye mtn kay jzabat (msabt ya mnfy) ki pysh ghwiy krsktay hayn۔RNNs khasa tawr par is kam kay l suitable mwzawn hain kywnkha woh mtn main trtyb war anhasaar par kbzuha krsktay hayn۔jzabat kay tjzayay kay liye aar ayn ayn ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat yeh hayn: aadad wa shmar ki tyary: jzabat kay tjzayay kay liye ayk lybl laga hoa daytasyt tyar karain ، jahan hr mtn ka nmwnha ayk jzabat kay lybl (msabt ya mnfy) sy wabstha hawta haay۔

Question: tdryjy tawr par frwgh pzayr drkhtwn kay jwranay wali trbyt main jld rknay ka mksad kya hay aur yeh kesay kam krta haay؟
Answer: trbyt kay aml kay doran tdryjy tawr par frwgh pzayr drkhtwn kay jwranay wali trbyt main abtdaiy tawr par rkna ayk aysy tknyk hay jo zayada sy zayada mnasb hony ko rwknay aur zayada sy zayada tadad ko brahanay waly tkrar (jsay drkhtwn kay nam sy bhi jana jata haay) ka tayn karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔jld rknay ka mksad is nktaha ko tlash karna hay js par ayk twsayk kay syt par madal ki karkrdghy harasan hona shrwa hawjaty hay ، js sy yeh zaahar hawta hay keh mazeed is ki nshandhay hawty haay۔

Question: aasaaby mshyn trjmay kay madalza main lfza sydh kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: aasaaby mshyn translyshn (ayn aym ty) kay madalza main wrda sydh sy mrad makhza zaban aur hadf zaban kay jmlwn kay mabyn alfaza ko sydh main karnay kay aml sy mrad haay۔as ka mksad mnba jmlay main alfaza aur hadf kay jmlha main un kay mtalkha trjmwn kay mabyn khta wa ktabt ya saf bndy kaim karna haay۔ayn aym ty madalza main wrda sydh ayk lazmi jzaw hay kywnkha is sy madal ko mkhtlf zabanwn main alfaza kay mabyn trjmay ka rshtha sykhnay main mdd mlty haay۔yhaan NMT madalza main lfza sydh kay tsawr ki wzuahat haay: lfza ki sydh ki ahamyt: aasaaby mshyn trjmha main ، madal makhza zaban kay jmlha sy kesi hadf ki zaban kay jmlay main trjmha karna sykhta haay۔ wrda ki saf bndy bohat zurwry hay kywnkha is ki wjha yeh haay۔

Question: bay zuabtaghy ka ptha lghanay kay liye jnrytw aydawrsyryl nyt wrk (GAN) ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: bay zuabtaghy ka ptha lghanay kay liye jnrytw aydawrsyryl nyt wrk (GAN) ki trbyt main ayk madal bnanay kay liye kiy akdamat shaml hain jo aam aadad wa shmar tyar krskyn aur ghair mamwly nmwnwn ki nshandhay krskyn۔bay zuabtaghy ka ptha lghanay kay liye ayk GAN ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat yeh hayn: dayta ki tyary: aam dayta kay nmwnay par mushtamil daytasyt tyar kryn۔adm asthakam ya tou nayab wakaat ya dayta pwaints hawsktay hain jo aam tksym sy nmayan tawr par anharaf karty hayn۔ is bat ka ykyn karain keh daytasyt achhy tarah sy pyshghy hay aur mtalwbha khsawsayat ki nmaindghy krta hay jo mamwl kay tarza aml ki wzuahat krty haay۔aam tawr par ghan par mushtamil hawta hay

Question: fysalha try madalza main L1 aur L2 ko bakaadha bnanay main kya frk haay؟
Answer: fysalay kay drkhtwn kay madalza main ، L1 aur L2 ryghwlraizayshn do mkhtlf aksam ko bakaadha bnanay ki tknyk ka hawalha dytay hain jo zayada mnasb hony ko rwknay aur madal ki amwmy salahayt ko bhatr bnanay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔fysalay kay drkhtwn kay madalza main L1 aur L2 ko bakaadha bnanay kay darmiyan aham akhtlafat yeh hayn: jrmanay ka hasab ktab: L1 ryghwlraizayshn (LASSO): L1 bakaadghy sy nksaan ki tkryb main jrmanha ki asatalaha shaml hawty hay jo madal kay ghtankwn ya khsawsayt kay wzan ki mtalk akdar kay mtnasb haay۔jrmanay ki asatalaha ko ghtank ki mtalk akdar kay mjmwaha kay tawr par hasab kya jata haay۔jrmanay ki asatalaha ko ghtank ki mrba akdar kay mjmwaha kay tawr par hasab kya jata haay۔

Question: adakar-tnkydy alghwrthm kay tsawr aur un kay astamal ko kmk sykhnay main astamal kryn۔
Answer: adakar tnkydy alghwrthm kmk lrnngh alghwrthm ki ayk klas hay jo kmk sykhnay kay kamwn main zayada sy zayada palysyan sykhnay kay liye wylyw par mbny tarykwn (nkad) aur palysy par mbny tarykwn (adakar) dono kay anasar ko ykja krty haay۔yha alghwrthm mkhtlf dawmynza main braay pymanay par astamal hawtay rahay hain ، jn main rwbwtks ، ghym playngh ، aur khud mkhtar ayjnt shaml hayn۔yhaan adakar-tnkydy alghwrthm kay tsawr aur un kay astamal sy kmk lrnngh kay astamal ki wzuahat haay: adakar: adakar ka jzaw mwjwdha palysy par mbny akdamat kay antkhab kay liye zamha dar haay۔ adakar braha rast ayk aysy palysy tkryb sykhta hay js sy ryastwn ka nkshha tyar krta haay۔aml۔ palysy mtnazaaha hawskty hay ، jahan adakar braha rast bhatryn aml ، ya astakstk ko aaghay brahata hay ، jahan adakar aml sy zayada amkany tksym ko pysh krta haay۔ adakar ka mksad wkt kay sath mtwka wapsy ya mjmway anaam ko zayada sy zayada karna haay۔

Question: bay zuabtaghy ka ptha lghanay kay liye ayk mtghyr aatw aynkwdar (VAE) ki trbyt main shaml aham akdamat ki wzuahat kryn۔
